reviews.review_text: Got a sample size of this 5 years ago and have since purchased the full size 4 times. Very long lasting, smells fresh/earthy/powdery, gives a youthful dew & leaves your face looking supple, radiant & bouncy. MAGIC in a bottle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Frequent reader of reviews, but I never write them myself. This serum made me do it!!! I started with the sample and was so blown away, I didn’t mind pulling the trigger on the full size. YOU GUYS. I am 32 and have never been able to NOT wear makeup. This stuff has me out here in broad daylight with glass skin, no makeup, and I’ve received so many compliments. Usually when I don’t wear makeup, I get “are you sick?”, “have you been crying?”, “are you okay?”. No more!! It is unbelievable and works right away. It’s not just the hyperpigmentation too - its crow’s feet, acne scars, dark circles, pores, hydration - I mean, truly, EVERYTHING!! Get a sample first if you’re scared of the price. You won’t regret it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to try this serum, but upon opening the containing I got used item. The estee lauder Advanced Night Repair Serum is amazing. I will just stick to that.. end up returning and getting biossance moisturizer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really works. I noticed a reduction in redness and skin darkness the very first day. It hasn’t eliminated my dark spots yet but I definitely see my skin is brighter and younger looking almost immediately. I will definitely keep using it for more results. I also like that it is not sticky, very thin so easy to layer with other products. The scent is also subtle not too strong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily acne prone skin that’s on the dry side Bc I use a 5x retinol at night. I’ve been using it for a couple months. It’s hydrating and absorbs easily. With consistent use and SUNSCREEN you’ll see a difference. I removed a star because of the price and the fragrance took some getting used to. The fragrance didn’t irritate my sensitive skin, but it would be a nice alternative.

reviews.review_title: Didn’t work for my African American skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just didn’t work for me. I suffer from hyperpigmentation, and if this would’ve worked, I would have accepted the price. However, it seemed to make absolutely no difference. It doesn’t even feel like it’s able to penetrate my skin. It does leave a nice glow since it doesn’t fully get absorbed into my skin. I gave it two stars opposed to one because it feels nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I gave it 4 stars only because of the price. But it is so worth the purchase. My dark spots are fading and my skin is more radiant than ever. I have been getting compliments on my skin ever since using this product. I use it during morning and night time skin routines. My skin has also been very soft since using. I combine with my AHA and BHAs and my skin has been perfect.

reviews.review_title: Hate the price, love the product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is so expensive….but when I tell you it is the ONLY serum I’ve used that is non- irritating on my sensitive skin, not greasy and it works. I’ve tried so many different dark spot correctors, vitamin c serums from so many different brands and I always come back to this one. Dark spots where??? Another positive is, it does last you a while and a little goes a long way. The simpler your routine with this the better. I cleanse, tone, use this and then follow with moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a noticeable difference , but I find it quite expensive for what it is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing it calms my skin and axes dark spots. This is my favorite skincare product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not for me, it didn't do anything. I have extremely dry skin and I have some hyperpigmentation as well which is why I tried this serum, but it didn't do anything in that area. I wouldn't recommend for other people with a dry skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Used Kiehls Vitamin C for 2 years. Tried a sample of this serum. I suffer from hyper-pigmentation and acne scars. I saw results in two weeks: fading scars and more even skin tone.

reviews.review_title: Gentle and effective reset for stressed skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy this product. The most hydrating milky serum I have yet experienced. It helped to calm my skin and restore my texture when I was going through an extremely stressful time mentally but also physically as my environment was stressing my skin out quite a bit. I don't have any major dark spots besides a couple of mild sun spots so I can't comment too much on the efficacy of that claim however I do find using this serum under a moisturizer works well for me in the winter when I need more umph without the weight of a thick cream. That being said I don't notice it does much for long-term maintenance so I will primarily keep it to use when I need a reset for my skin. This does contain perfume but so far has not irritated my skin.

reviews.review_title: staple product for me for 5+ years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product. I have been using this product since it was a Sephora birthday gift (will assume 5+ years now and more). I am aware that they changed their formula recently so I was a little concerned about whether it was still a good product for my skin, but after trying the new formulation, no issue here.  Overall, I find this serum great for giving you that even toned, glowy skin from within. I have on occasion noticed that it had helped with some new blemishes I get on my skin but for the old ones that I have it did not change much. With that being said though, I have sensitive, combination and eczema skin and for a long time I wasn’t able to get anything onto my skin without getting some sort of reaction, so this product really changed my skin care game, and was really the beginning for me.   Though I really enjoy this product and stand behind the 5 stars, I would say that price for the amount you get isn’t a lot and often wished that I could get a larger size of this. In addition, because of the texture of the product, to get the remaining few drops out can take some work but I hate to waste so I make do the best I can.   I have over the years tried to replace this product with other products to see if I could go cheaper but in the end, I still end up coming back to this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a little jealous of all the people sharing their great experiences with this serum. This is one of the most expensive skincare product I’ve gotten and it did absolutely nothing for me. I started using this at a time when I was breaking out a lot more than usual which meant that there was plenty of hyperpigmentation to work on but I’m done with the bottle now, two months later and really no change. I did like that it felt nourishing and because of its creamy texture, a little goes a long way. Unfortunately for me though, I wasted my time and money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this on and off for years and I always am amazed at how drastic the change is in my skin when I'm using this consistently. I have dull, dry skin that is acne prone so I have a lot of old scarring. This product hydrates, smooths, and fades the old scars so quickly. I have never found a product that gives me that inner glow like this one does. truly a holy grail skincare product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Effective product lightens brown spots anywhere on the face, also works on hands. Gentle, non-irritating. Also works well as a face serum to give skin more radiance, leaves it dewy and glowing. Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this product as a redeemable reward. BUT This product is not fragrance free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best serums i’ve tried! it got rid of little scars on my face and dullness i had around my eye area, but it’s definitely overpriced so that’s why i didn’t repurchase it

reviews.review_title: Love!!! Ideal to fix skin damage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cleared up acne scars I had for many many years. My skin is now clear. Use this and also retinoids at night (not at the same time). I used this as night in problem areas. It took time but my acne scars and holes are totally gone and I can finally go without any foundation. I cannot recommend this amazing beautiful product enough. Thank you Caudalie!!!
My skin soaks up this serum, feels so smooth after, and I love the things it does to my complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this serum for just about 9 years and it completely changed my skin. No more spots, just even skin and no more discoloration. Absolutely amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Mixed feelings about this one. I did notice a brighter, more smooth complexion after a couple weeks using this as my AM serum. Unfortunately though, this product also broke me out in small, surface level bumps that went away immediately after I discontinued use. I can totally see how others would love this serum, but it just didn’t agree with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice product if you are looking to get rid of dark spots from acne scaring. Did nothing for my sunspots. A little sticky after first putting on. Has a flowery fragrance I wasn’t a huge fan of. Overall for the price, I wouldn’t recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was recommended to me by a co worker and I’m in love with it! After just a couple of weeks I noticed my dark spots and redness started fading. It is a little pricy, but well worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself has a light fragrant that leaves my skin moisturized and dewey. I got a sample years ago and could not stop thinking about it and although it’s a bit pricey you only need a few drops.   Paired with the Vinoperfect Essence I find that my skin tone and texture has improved in the few months I’ve used it. I also love how it’s working to better my skin over time and if I stop using it because the stores are out of stock my skin won’t go bad. I want products that will help my skin now and have lasting results over time, not go lose effect the minute I stop wearing it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Caudalie is one of my favorite brands and this is one of my favorite products. Def will buy again. Makes my skin even and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is an instantaneous change in the skin! The glow and hydration are long lasting ♡  I first received this product as a free sample, and finally got a new big bottle for everyday use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think having melanin helps this work! I have medium-tan mixed race skin and this works better than any retinol or vitamin c I’ve ever used. Highly recommend, I’m half way through a bottle and am super happy with the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Compared to other serums in this price range this didn’t work for me. Very disappointed considering a lot of the reviews were so positive.  While my face was hydrated it was only short term. Within a few hours my face was dry. There is no brightening results for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried so many so many products for my hyperpigmentation and this one takes the cake! I know it’s a bit pricey but SO WORTH ITTT! I love this one so much, I’ve noticed such a difference in my skin. I’m on my second bottle my skin loves this. Try this it’s a mustttt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this ! Better than vitamin C .. can definitely see a visible glow in your face after a few days of use and it lasts pretty long but my god it’s expensive lol. I don’t know if this actually helps hyperpigmentation but I will definitely say it helps to brighten and even out your complexion and I do honestly feel like my pores are less visible when I use this for some reason but maybe that’s because of one of my other products like glycolic acid toner. All in all love this and would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I have noticed a reduction in my hyperpigmentation from acne scars. The fragrance is light and it is moisturizing. Although expensive I think it is worth every cent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin due to Eczema and have had a hard time finding the right skincare products. I didn’t get any flare ups or reactions to this. I’ve been using it for a few months and it has definitely brightened and evened my skin complexion. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Completely surprised by this product.  Its brightening, pairs well with other skincare and make up ,absorbs nicely.  I can see my skin visibly brighter and have used 3 bottles( every last drop).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Visibly brighter skin. Repeat purchase for me, even stocked up at Duty Free at the airport.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this as a sample that I got, I purchased it and it smells completely different. Its far too scented which is overpowering if you have a sensitive nose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product more than 6 months now. It works slow but it works! I have very pale skin and whenever I get breakouts it always leaves very visible pigmentation, this was the reason I purchased vinoperfect serum to help my post acne pigmentation. Not only it helped that, it also somehow controls my skin not to get any major breakout whenever I’m using this product. I’ve had to travel a lot lately, I finished one bottle and got acne as soon as I stopped using it. I bought second bottle and my skin already feels better. So I would definitely recommend this to someone with acne and post acne pigmentation- it really works, but you have to give it time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for years! My skin is not the same without it. 100% recommended over and over

reviews.review_title: Does not help with dark spots
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product claims to help with dark spots but I’ll seen no improvement with my post inflammatory hyperpigmentation after the first bottle. It does help retain moisture and gives a little glow but that’s it; not worth the price in my opinion.

reviews.review_title: It Now Breaks My Skin Out
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this serum for a long time. Recently it started breaking me and it confused me as to why. I am not sure if they have added new ingredients to it? However, I'll have to add another serum to my nightly routine :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super disappointing—no change in my dark spots after using nearly whole bottle.

reviews.review_title: didn’t do much for me but gives a nice glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this viral product. I love the smell. And it gives a nice glow. I used it twice a day for a month (until it was empty). Unfortunately, I didn’t see any difference in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeeee this serum, it smells so good and makes my skin look amazing every single time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Seems to work! Almost finished one bottle, and my dark sun spots are so much better. Thinking of repurchasing again to get rid of the final shades. Nice texture and scent too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the texture! Great smell and my skin started to show results after just a few uses. I have dark spots and this serum really helps my moisturizer get a boost.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for few years now. It fades dark spots and give a nice glow. I used it during my pregnancies as it is clean. Will continue using it.

reviews.review_title: Basic hydrating serum, no other visible changes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum hydrates my skin and I see a soft glow after using it. Another good thing about this serum is it doesn’t clog pores. I have large pores problem and it didn’t break me out.  However, i will not purchase this serum again. Apart from hydrating my skin, it didn’t do anything else. I didn’t see any changes in my skin texture or hyperpigmentation. For a serum this pricey, I expected more than just hydrating.

reviews.review_title: saw no difference in skin after an entire bottle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Full disclaimer: I only get 0-3 tiny little pimples a month & I have dry skin. I used an entire bottle of this and didn’t see any change in texture or any noticeable difference in the few dark spots that I have. It did make my skin feel nice immediately upon application though but I think it’s because it has ingredients that are commonly used in skincare to help make skin look smooth after application. Price point wise it isn’t worth it for me. Maybe this product is best suited for those who go out into the sun more and have sun damage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received it as a sample - liked the product. Didn’t make my face shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this product! Only first week of using it and I see a difference already! Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This, along with the Vinopure Skin Perfecting Serum, is my ultimate skincare staple. I've been a skincare skeptic for a while - I've never noticed a sufficient difference to merit the prices of most skincare products. I've struggled with hormonal acne in the past, and have residual scarring and discolouration. I've noticed after using this a few times, my skin looks visibly brighter and clearer. For the first time in a while, I feel confident not wearing foundation or concealer. I highly recommend people try a sample to see if it works for them. It is expensive, but a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: Very effective, but process may be slow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this serum. Unlike the brightening cream from this company (which was too greasy for my skin, made me oily, and gave me painful breakouts), the serum is lightweight and very effective in slowly evening out the skintone for me. I've used a sample size for about 2 months and it really did bring down my hyperpigmentation from sun damage and made my skin look brighter. I do use it generously (aka like 3-5 drops in the morning and again at night). Just ordered and started using the full size bottle. Will continue to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Took about half way through the bottle to see results. In the last year I noticed sun damage cropping up from my misspend youth in the Florida sun. This has significantly helped the discoloration and spots around my cheeks. I use about 5 drops every night, focusing on areas with the most damage. About a week ago I realized my skin really did look better. This takes time and patience, but I suppose the sun damage didn’t happen over night and it’s going to take time to get rid of it.

reviews.review_title: They changed the formula, not for the better : ((
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This used to be my holy grail hydrating serum. I'm not sure if it ever helped with my melasma patches, but was unique and worth every penny for its dewy, non-sticky formula.. Suddenly the bottle design looked different, and the serum felt like it had something slippery or siliconey added, and has lost the non-slippery hydration I loved.  It's still good, but I'm not a fan of slick siliconey feeling serums, so I likely won't repurcchase.

reviews.review_title: Run don’t walk to buy this!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! I just added this to my routine about 3 weeks ago and can already see my dark spots dramatically disappearing. I’ve been using vitamin C and lactic acid as well for over a year but this was the product that really made the difference. Run to Sephora to get it!!!

reviews.review_title: I might stray, but I always come back!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product!! My skin is extremely sensitive with moderate rosacea, most products sting when they go on my skin. I never have issues with this serum. My skin glows and feels great when I wear this. It is definitely pricey, however the quality is fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hate how much I like this product because of how expensive it is, but a little goes a long way and it smells subtly of fresh grape leaves. I’ve already used it twice and have seen acne scars already fading. I am hoping it’ll do the same for my melasma.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 3 weeks more or less and see no results—granted that I decided to use it only at nights because during the day I am wearing a mask all the time and didn’t want to waste it on the mask.  For the price, I don’t care so much about the packaging, the fragrance, the bottle, etc.  I care that it works and I don’t think it does. I am giving it 2 starts because it wasn’t tested on animals or used animals ingredients.

reviews.review_title: Great product, love the new packaging.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I am still using my product up from the old packaging - I like the way the new bottle looks with the fogged glass.  As far as performance - I had a lot of dark spots from acne scars and after using this product faithfully everyday, my skin has been clear and free from dark scar spots.  The texture of the serum is so viscous - it smoothes all over the face and absorbs, one bottle lasts me a nice length of time because a little bit, goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is absolutely amazing. Didnt even know I needed it. My skin looks clean and fresh cero dark spots, way more useful than Vitamin C serums.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure this is doing anything for the spots I was trying to rid myself of, I don't think 2~3 weeks is long enough to tell. But the small sample I had lasted a while, and for the duration of use my overall skin tone was much more evened out. I also like that this product seems very gentle. I am likely to return and purchase the full-sized version and put it into the regular rotation when I've finished trying out all the other products I'm curious about.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only serum I have repurchased multiple times. I have very sensitive skin and this product has never given me any irritation. My skin looks so radiant and glowy and I definitely see a difference when I use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. I can't use vitamin c products on my face because it cause my face to turn red and burn but this serum is great! It is more than I would ordinarily pay for a serum but I have a sample bottle and I can really see a difference in my complexion after using it for two weeks. Well worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this spot serum! I was looking for something to get rid of post acne marks and this has been helping tremendously! Will continue to use and finish the first bottle and then continue purchasing. The slight smell is nice as well. Worth the money!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ce sérum rend ma peau plus éclatante, plus lumineuse. Pour ce qui est de la réduction des taches pigmentaires/cicatrices; ça fonctionne mais il n'y a rien de miraculeux! Je recommande ce produit sans hésité !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a must have item for everyday skin-care routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing for sun spots and when my freckles go crazy. Helps even complexion with a clean formula. Does make skin immediately radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for nearly a month now and have been constantly getting compliments on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is is the first and only product out of many that I have found that has actually helped clear up and lighten my dark spots from having melasma on my face. I noticed improvement literally after just 3 uses. A little goes a long way too! I've been so self-conscious about the dark spots on my face (melasma) for years now, and once I saw that this was helping it, I literally started crying genuine happy tears of relief and now I can't live without this product! It's the HOLY GRAIL of dark spot correctors! And it's worth every penny! I didn't take before pics..otherwise I would be glad to show proof of the improvement it's made.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so skeptical about purchasing this product.  I had been researching it and reading reviews for a couple months after seeing it recommended on Tiktok.  I had read some didn't like it after the product was reformulated.  I went to Sephora on the weekend and spoke to a few different staff members about it and all raved and recommended.  I have been using it for 4 days and have already noticed a difference in my acne scarring and skin texture.  I am so impressed and highly recommend this to anyone who is thinking of purchasing.  I have been searching for years for something that I love and I think I have finally found it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started getting sun spots on my nose and forehead, I went to a dermatologist and they told me there was nothing that could be done. It became noticeable and I could not cover up with make-up, I decided to go into Sephora.  was recommended the Caudalie Serum, yes, it's pricey but a little goes a long way.  I also use Ren Spot Night Cream, morning and night use along with the Ren AHA Toner, my spots are completely gone! This did take 2 months for the full effects and daily morning and night. 3 steps, technically 4 with face wash (I use any face wash)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. I don’t usually buy things more than once but this is a must have. However it is expensive and I think if you don’t want to spend the money there are plenty of cheaper things that will work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always end up coming back to this for my olive acne prone hyper pigmented skin on my face. It’s pricey but worth it. I have tried other products instead, Kiehls, Clinique even better, and tons of other expensive orocuts for dark spots and hyperpigmentation. This stuff works!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Vinoperfect Caudalie products! I have suns spots for some years now, but I didn't realize they were sunspots since very recently, because they were a pale shade of pink but they darkened to a brownish color after unprotected sun exposure (I know). I've started with the glycolic peel mask, following but the radiance serum days after, and finally the glycolic toner.  Well, it's been three weeks and I can say they have brightened considerably, no foundation for this gal and it's a good thing since I upped my solar protection game. I have to say that I panicked a bit because at first, they darkened, but it's the normal process of cellular turnover to bring the old cell to the surface to be discarded, so no worry! I will continue to incorporate the rest of the line in my routine when I finished my other cream and I will never look back, just love it too much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this because I have melasma on my upper lip, the dreaded sun stash. I saw results pretty immediate after 1-3 times of using just in the morning along with the brightening cream they sell to go with this. It evened out my skin and made it feel nice, but it didn’t really do anything for the Melasma. So if you have just mild sun damage that isn’t due to melasma this will def help but not for anything more serious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a 10ml sample bottle that lasted me for 1 month. my dark spots have lightend to the point where my kids actually noticed. If yoyr kids actually take notice to something like that u know its working. I used it 1 time a day and it worked great. Its pricy but worth it. this is a 30 ml bottle so if you use it like i did it will last you 3 months. thats an avg cost of $24 a month. also only apply it to the areas of your face that actually have the spots. for me that would me my cheak areas on both sides and my jawline. I tell you this so you can get an idea of how much I was using everyday for it to last as long as it did. you cant go wrong with this product. you will be satiafied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sun damage for o we 5 years now I try different products and nothing work, I purchase this and put it to work right away I have results in 3 days I notice a difference I can’t believe it price is a little up there but consider that I looked everywhere is word it

reviews.review_text: I used a small sample bottle of the old formulation/packaging so I REALLY hope this version works just as well.  I started using this along with a niacinamide, and when I was done with my tiny sample bottle, my skin looked amazing. I struggle with redness, texture, large pores, and mild breakouts/irritation, and I feel like this helped correct all of those things. It evened out my skin tone beautifully. I like it better than any vitamin C serum I've ever used. After using this consistently my skin looked amazing without makeup, and with a single thin layer of foundation, it looked airbrushed. It didn't irritate my skin. I think it's definitely worth the price. I wasn't expecting a lot from it but I was absolutely blown away by how well it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I got this like 5 months ago now. Initially I used it off and on randomly. Although it made my skin feel hydrated and glowy, I didn’t notice a huge improvement on my acne scars which was why I bought it. After a few months I started using it in the morning and evening almost every day. MY ACNE SCARS ARE ALMOST GONE COMPLETELY! I do use many skincare products so I can’t say 1000% that this I the reason but I can say when I started using this frequently my acne scars disappeared and I think it’s because of this serum. I’m very prone to breakouts from skincare products and this has never caused me to breakout no matter how much I put on my face. It has a nice texture and smells nice. It’s definitely overpriced but I’m gonna keep buying it as long as it keeps fading my acne scars!

reviews.review_text: The old formula was my holy grail for brightening, evening out skin tone, and fading acne marks. For some reason the new formula breaks me out! I got tiny red bumps/clogged pores on my forehead by the 2nd day of using it, tried to let my skin adjust & kept using it for about 2 weeks before giving up after the bumps worsened to pimples on my cheeks & forehead. It didn’t seem like an allergic reaction, just clogged pores. My skin cleared up within a couple days of stopping it. I was able to buy one last bottle of the old formula from Caudalie’s website, and it doesn’t break me out. Guess I’ll just have to cherish my last bottle & then try to find a new product when it runs out! Super sad I can no longer use this product, it was worth the high price

reviews.review_text: This literally changed my skin for the best. I had the dullest and most uneven skin tone for these past few months. I knew it was my lackluster skin routine that was just not doing anything. Bought this during the VIB sale. It’s the most expensive skin care item in my collection BUT IT WORKS. reviews.review_title: An Essential Ingredient in the Holy Face Cocktail
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

My acne scars and sun spots have faded significantly—some have disappeared altogether. It goes on a bit tacky at first and less is more, but it dries well, and I’m able to apply primer and foundation, etc without any piling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product back when the packaging was the other one. I can’t say why I bought so many of these bottles because they aren’t the most low maintenance to purchase. This product will give back everything you invest in it! If you are looking to correct sun damage this is the number one fix. I have never had problems with freckles before. Suddenly one year I had five freckles on my check and this product fixed that for me, I would say 1/4 in to the first bottle. Buyer, you will become addicted to this line of products. You will just have to move on to pricier, grander things, if any!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 50 with one dark spot right under my eye. This serum makes that spot disappear. I’ve switched to the cashmere to try it out and the spot has come back. I will be sticking with the brightening products. This product is wonderful. I would recommend this line to anyone! Love it!

reviews.review_title: If vitamin C gives you acne, try this product!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If vitamin C serums make you breakout (which they did for me - and I tried most of them sold on Sephora), please check this out. It’s great! Its gives you the brightness and fading of dark spots that vitamin C is supposed to give you without the irritation. It was a game changer for my skin. It’s a great product and doesn’t even smell bad (like many vitamin C products do).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for over a month and I am super pleased with the results!  As I roll into my mid-30s, I am definitely seeing the beginning signs of aging. Significant problem areas include sun spots under my eyes and newly enlarged pores on my nose/cheek area. My pores look soooo much better after incorporating this serum into my routine. There is a noticeable improvement in the evenness of my skin tone. I use one dropper-full, once a day (morning or night depending on mood) and that covers my face, neck, and upper chest. I should also mention that I use this product in tandem with the Caudalie Vinoperfect Instant Brightening Moisturizer with Niacinamide or with the Caudalie Vinoperfect Brightening Glycolic Overnight Cream. The ingredients list gets a big thumbs up- vine sap that’s more than 60x effective at brightening than vitamin c? Crazy good. I have been using a serum with L-ascorbic acid for years and it’s nice to switch things up, while feeling confident that I’m still feeding my skin. Yes, there is a scent to this serum but it’s truly inoffensive. I have had the best experience with this serum!! #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not sure if they changed the formula for this serum with the bottle change, but if they did: Beware- the new formula feels very watered down, doesn’t smell good or feel the same as the old formula on my skin. It feels thin and watery, not leaving my skin as smooth and supple-feeling as my last bottle (the older one). I absolutely loved this product until my last shipment. Probably never buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

My skin looking brighter and glowy after using, and I love that this is a brightening serum that doesn't contain vitamin c (my skin is sensitive to it). It has a really earthy scent, which I love. If you're looking for a serum that helps with the texture and look of your skin, but isn't necessarily hydrating, this would be a great serum to try

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: MY GO TO SERUM FOR BRIGHTENING.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely *LOVE* this serum!  I tend to have dry skin, especially during the winter months.  I’ve been dabbling with a lot of brightening products and this is one of my top favorites.  It sits on the skin so nicely and absorbs quickly.  I purchased the bigger bottle which is sadly no longer available and have been using it about 2 months now.  I’ve gone from never doing skincare to getting heavy into it within the last 6 months.  This is the first product I can say I really saw a difference within the first week.  After using this product and seeing how great it was, I purchased some other Caudalie products and I’ve really loved them all!  I have sun spots from over exposing myself to the sun and years of tanning bed abuse, they have absolutely lightened to the point I cannot see them anymore unless I look really close.  Mainly on the top of my forehead I have sun spots, near my hairline.  I also have some uneven looking skin in other areas that has greatly improved to the point they’re not there anymore.  At first I thought it was all in my head, I was seeing what I wanted to see until my coworkers, family and friends all started complementing how bright and glowy my skin was!  I am a huge caudalie fan now and will continue to keep this in my skincare routine.  I hope they never discontinue or change the formula - I am in LOVE and can’t believe how much this product has changed my skin for the better!!  I don’t even wear foundation anymore :) if you’re wondering if you should get this, because it is pricey, give it a chance.  I don’t know if this is meant for dry skin but in combination with my moisturizer and other products, my skin has stayed flake free while using this.  I also wear this under my makeup as well and don’t have any pilling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like Caudalie Vinoperfect radiance serum complexion correcting.  It was a milky lightweight serum.  It was not sticky, makes my skin feels soft, and no scent.  It really corrects my dark spots and tighten my skin.  I used it in the morning.  It was a free sample from Topbox.  #freeproduct #trywithtopbox

reviews.review_text: I was using this previously but once I ran out I never bought another bottle because I didn't think there was enough product for the price. I also did think it did much for me. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Caudalie Radiance Serum for a couple of weeks now and have been very impressed with it so far. The serum itself is incredibly light and easy to wear. A little really does go a long way when targeting specific parts of the face.  I have quite a few sun spots and have seen a reduction in their visibility in just ten days which is awesome. I would have to cover these with concealer before but now they're barely noticeable. A couple of the bigger and darker spots are still around my eyes and cheek area but I hope that they will disappear or lighten as I keep using the serum. Great product overall. I received this serum as a #freeproduct sample from topbox circle in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_text: I have to have this product in my skincare routine or else I regret it. Yes it is a bit pricey but I don’t mind spending so much on something that makes my skin amazing. First off this serum is amazing at targeting old acne spots/darken spots, but what people do not know is how good it is at dealing without breakouts! I read that grapeseed extract is amazing for acne so I started dabbing this serum more and more often. I would leave a glob over my pimple and would wake up to it being dramatically reduced in size and redness, and then a day after that it is almost completely gone. I absolutely love this serum and I hope they never change it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by first explaining how much I love Caudalie (obsessed with their grape water, detox oil and lip conditioner) and how much I want to love this every time I buy it.... I’ve used a few full bottles now...I seem to try again every other year. Here’s what happens: - it works well for me at first — my skin brightens, looks great and feels great... - then, after a few weeks I start to notice lots of clogged pores. At first, it’s nothing crazy and it’s bearable. But then, they start to get big and cause issues, making skin look super textured, and makeup starts to look terrible - I stop using it on my face and end up finishing the bottle on my neck and chest lol.  I’ve learned after lots of research that my skin simply can’t handle creamy serums like this. So I’ve switched to a non comedogenic balm, which is much better for my skin type.

reviews.review_text: Love this product. I initially went in to get another dark spot serum but, after speaking with one of the associates, ended up purchasing this one. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for at least 3 years now and I truly cannot find a better serum for my acne scars! After several uses, I noticed that my spots were getting lighter and my redness was reduced. I don’t think it claims to help with pimples, but when I do end up with hormonal acne or pimples by trying out a new face product, it always helps make the pimples go away that much faster and reduced the overall appearance. The times that I have ran out of this and hadn’t repurchased it, my complexion was uneven and I could tell I needed to buy this serum again.  This has a very very faint scent but goes away and I will say that the 1oz bottle only lasts for a few months when used every night (I only use this at night after a regular wash, exfoliating wash or mask). Highly recommend making the investment over other serums!

I started with just nighttime instead and I’ve gotten about a year out of the bottle using sparingly. I should also add I’m only 29 but did have a couple wrinkles at about 26/27 not anymore!! reviews.review_title: The only thing that has made a dent in my melasma
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little about me- I’ve been suffering from melasma for almost 5 years. Cause for it is probably birth control pills, not 100% sure. Had melasma when I miscarried 10+ years ago but hydroquinone cleared that up easily. NOTHING, until Vinoperfect, has even made a dent. I’ve used tretinoin, C+E Ferulic, 4% Hydroquinone, kojic acid, diet changes, glycolic acid, Differin gel, dermaroller, face shaving. I got a sample of it from Sephora awhile back and I thought maybe it was helping but I didn’t use it regularly so I wasn’t sure. In November I bought the full size and began using it 1-2 times a day, always in conjunction with The Ordinary’s Vit C powder in the morning and/or Differin gel (and sometimes 10% glycolic acid cream) in the evening. The results? I can tell that it is working!! Mind you, it’s not entirely gone. If it does go away entirely I will update and change to 5 stars (although honestly, this should probably be a 5-star review considering it is the only thing that has helped). Before Vinoperfect, you could definitely see the melasma even after using foundation or concealer — covering it up just made it less obnoxious. Now, you can barely tell it’s there with cover up, maybe not at all. And for the first time in years, I sometimes go without foundation/concealer. It’s there, but it’s definitely lighter and I don’t feel self-conscious like I once did.   It’s interesting though- for me, it doesn’t seem like it’s broken up much scarring or freckle-type pigmentation. I get the little shadow scars from acne that doesn’t even break skin. But that’s not what’s bothered me these last few years. It’s the splotchy, uneven tone of melasma that I’ve hated for so long. I never wore foundation before melasma and until Vinoperfect, I tried so many different brands, color correctors, you name it. And now to not have to feel like I’m fighting it every day? I might just change my review to five stars!

This serum has a milky texture,  and it is slightly hydrating to the skin. When I first tried this product I was dissatisfied because I seen no results right away. After about 6 weeks or so my skin started slowly transitioning. My skin started to glow,  look brighter,  scars was fading and my complexion had radiance. I have not tried another serum since. This serum plays well with other brands products that I have tried. I use this product daily and nightly and a 1 oz bottle last me 3 months. It takes a moment or two to dry after application and then I proceed with my eye cream, moisturizer and oil (at night only). I truly feel like this product deserve 5 stars. --I've purchased this product with my own funds.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this 10 stars if I could! It is absolutely a miracle worker! I am 43 and have tried SO MANY products to try and undue the sun damage that I did to my face in my younger days. I read magazine articles and blogs in search of a product that actually works. And then I stumbled across this. OMG, it literally reduced the dark sun spots on my face in 2 days. My husband of course can't tell, but I can, and that's what matters! It is lightweight and feels so good when applied. Seriously, you can't go wrong with this product!

reviews.review_text: Not giving this 5 stars cause the consistency has been uneven recently depending on whether I buy it online or in the store... I wonder why this is?? Different formulas? Sediment? Expired product? Who knows... in any case this is usually one of my favorite serums cause the glow is immediately noticeable. Granted that the glow doesn’t last alllll day but it’s miles ahead of comparable products. I also like that it doesn’t have any acids in it unlike almost every other product on the market these days - a plus for sensitive skin imo. It’s not tacky to the touch or heavy and smells wonderful. I have sensitive skin and it has never once broken me out but I stopped using it to try other serums just cause the price tag was a bit high and I have yet to find a comparable serum. It also lasts quite a long time, my small bottle lasts almost 3 months so the price evens out compared to $50-$60 serums that last a month. Overall great product. They just need to figure out why the online serum is thicker than the store bought serum and why it has a different dropper cause I lowkey felt scammed and don’t know if I can trust Sephora anymore

Unfortunately, I had to return this one based on my skin needs. I will say that my mother has mature, less sensitive skin and likes this product. She uses it every other day for brightening and uses vit C on her off days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually write product reviews, but I really wanted to give a shoutout to this one. I've been using this product since 2019 to get rid of a dark sun spot on my left cheek—mainly caused by every day commute and all the UV exposure to the left side of my face as I drive. This patch has lightened considerably, to the point that I don't need to use this serum as much as I did at the beginning. Like every good social scientist/researcher, I believe more in the effects of longitudinal studies, and I'd say over a year's time of observation is sufficient proof of this product's effectiveness. (The one confounding variable is I don't need to drive as much as I used to since March of this year, so arguably, that side of my face has not been exposed as much as it used to be, but even before March of this year, I had noticed significant improvement, so I still give much credit to this product.)

I used it twice a day for a week and even my husband said how nice my skin was looking.  I have some discoloration that popped up during chemo treatments and this is helping to even everything out. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m really happy with this product! I am using this serum along with the night cream and essence and I feel like my skin looks smoother and has a more even tone. These products aren’t cheap, but so far they are 100% worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This might end up being the only 5-star review I'll ever give on Sephora. I've used this product more on than off the last two decades because whenever I've NOT used it, I've noticed a near-immediate difference (within the month) in skin tone and texture. My skin is VERY reactive to certain oils and silicones, and this serum works amazingly well for my purposes (which is looking as flawless as possible without foundation).  A note on my headline: at this point, I only use this in the morning (unless I need to wash my face before a date?? whaaaaat??), so an ounce will last me a couple of months. If I had to, I'd probably pare down everything else in my routine (leaving myself with just an oil-free cleanser, a toner, a moisturizer, a balm [instead of eye cream], and an oil-free sunblock) to afford this. Luckily, I stocked up while traveling prior to the pandemic.

reviews.review_title: Takes a while, but works wonders
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am on my third bottle of this product after using it daily morning and night, and it has completely transformed my skin. I had bad dark spots and some scarring from acne, and now my skin's color is uniform and texture is much smoother. That being said, it takes a while to get those results and it is an expensive product. I saw some results after the first bottle (lasted about 6-8 weeks), but the real skin transformation happened during the second bottle. It is easy to apply, absorbs quickly, smells great, and doesn't make me break out (which almost everything does!). I always wanted a product which made foundation feel optional, and this totally did that. The main downside I would say is that it takes a while to work and is very expensive. But if you have the money and patience it will completely transform your skin! Another plus, it does give your skin a lovely glow after applying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Makes your skin sticky, even made mine itch a little. doesn’t smell great either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I NEVER have breakouts. I never have reactions to skin care. So when I got a travel size of this I started using it immediately. A few days later I noticed a tiny red bump. Then the next day 2 giant red bumps. The new products I used were this and a serum from the Ordinary. So I used this one, with nothing else and my whole face is covered in red bumps. I then used a charcoal mask and no skin care and it looks better.   This is the culprit. It looks like not a ton of people had this issue but I definitely did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is without a doubt an amazing, lightweight product that reduces dark spots, but it needs time to work wonders, as well as other products. This is a higher priced product, but there are so many others that fit this price range and has the same results. This is my favorite because of the effectiveness and the lightweight and soft texture. I've been using this product for the past few months (AM & PM) and it's significantly shown signs of progress. I traveled to Egypt and did not wear the right skin protection and I paid the price. The dark spots have considerably gotten lighter though. I just pat it on the concerning areas followed by my Drunk Elephant Protini moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Re-purchase of a product I used before. This works better than Vit C for acne and sun damage and can be used in conjunction with other products (like Vit C) to attack dark spots on many fronts.  This works on the deep layers with grape vine sap and that not only gets rid of the spots there but also tells the skin to slow production of the melanin, so less spots are waiting under the surface. So light-weight, like a milk and absorbs totally.  Easy to wear make-up over it.   Tip/Trick:  If you have bad under-eye dark circles, pat the residual from your finger tips, under your eyes after applying to your face. Do not direct apply as that may be too strong on the eye area but a small amount of the the grape sap, will increases blood flow to that area and reduce the darkness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used a promo code on Sephora’s website and received sample packets of this product.   It’s very expensive and not something I would normally buy but I was curious.  I have some faint sun spotting on my cheeks and am always looking for something that may help.  Unfortunately, I tried it once and won’t be using the rest of the packets.  The first thing that struck me was the scent.  I’ve been using unscented or faintly/natural scented products for a long time so I’m not accustomed to perfume-y serums.  The fragrance isn’t unpleasant but it’s strong and SO unnecessary in a face serum!  Do people really need this in order to like a product?!?   It’s been shown that fragrance isn’t good for our skin so why companies continue to add it baffles me.  In addition to the fragrance, the texture is very sticky and uncomfortable.  I had to wash my face and hands shortly after using this!  Nowadays there are so many wonderful skin care companies making products with quality ingredients that are affordable...  I don’t see why anyone would spend their hard earned money on something like this.  If this works for you I’m glad but I definitely wouldn’t recommend it.

This in conjunction with the Olehenrikson Find Your Balance Oil Control Cleanser have seriously changed the game for me. Game over. So worth the money.

reviews.review_title: A bit disappointed for the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have normal, nonsensitive skin, in my late twenties, above average skin saavy. I was looking for a vitamin C or anti-aging serum and bought this after a Sephora employee highly recommend this to me. I honestly have mixed feelings about it. So I have pretty unblemished Asian skin. I finished this bottle, but don't feel like I saw a dramatic difference. Disclaimer, I didn't do a before and after photo so of course, it may be that I had too high expectations (after all this costs a lot, and the employee did hype it a lot). But I've definitely seen more satisfying results from using Vitamin C. If you want to see results on your skin, this might not be for you. Or maybe just not for people in their twenties or people who already have pretty unblemished skin. I would give three stars, but given how expensive it is and the alternatives out there, giving two.   If you do buy, they occasionally have value deals where they sell the full-size serum along with a toner and other Caudalie item for the same price as just the serum. Would recommend you buy it then. I bought it then and also got the Essence and  some Glycolic Acid Cream thing.

reviews.review_title: A serum worth the price tag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this serum a little over a month ago after I purchased the Caudalie Favorites set. For reference, I am an African American woman with oily skin who scars very easily and has many dark spots due to old anxiety-driven-picking habits.  Ill start with what I'm not crazy about: I use this serum directly after washing my face with the Caudalie Gel Cleanser. No matter how you apply it, there is a tacky feeling that doesn't seem to go away UNLESS you follow up with a moisturizer (I use Caudalie's moisture sorbet cream).  What I love: Since using it, my skin tone appears more even and more radiant--I've got a little glow pre-makeup. This isn't an overnight product -- it's definitely taking some time to rid myself of the dark spots. I don't use this twice a day -- only in my morning routine, yet my scars are noticeably improved after a little over a month of consistent use.  It has a high price tag however a little goes a long way (2-3 drops will suffice for full face coverage). Keeps my skin feeling smooth and hydrated and did help even my skin tone (it’s not a retinol so I don’t expect drastic results). But my skin is sad when I run out and it doesn’t have this. My texture gets rougher, the surface is dry, all and all it’s sad.  Tl;Dr - replaced vit c serum, used continuously for over 2 years, will never go without- makes skin healthier in total.

Before I used this serum, I used to get such bad hyperpigmentation after a breakout—but now I don’t get any, plus it works to fade old dark spots as well. It makes me look hydrated and glowy! My skin tone is less red and more even toned, my pores have shrunk, and my skin looks more youthful. I have combination skin, with chin hormonal acne from time to time. I use this product everywhere but my chin. I have been cleansing with a clinique salicylic deep pore scrub, and spot treatment with an otc acne spot treatment. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this serum for almost two years, before it was even marketed as a spot lightener. I was doubtful at first, but after 2-3 months of once-daily use—I am thrilled with the stuff. It’s lightened my many dark spots from sun damage. It’s made my skin smoother, softer, and  visibly younger. At 55, I regret all the years of sun worship. As a fair-skinned redhead, I was stupid not to use sunblock, and my skin has made me PAY. But this lovely serum has helped so much, especially since I use other Caudalie products too. Remember this is a natural, “clean” serum that takes time to work. A few months may go by before spots really start to lighten up. But you will see improvement sooner when it comes to tighter looking pores, creamy smooth skin, and general glow-from-within skin. The spot lightening is more gradual, but gentler by far. I also use it once daily on my chest, which was a rough, red bumpy mess...covered with freckles & sunspots. I’m still amazed by its effect on my sun-baked chest & décolleté. It’s now smooth & silky, and the 5 million sun spots have been either lightened or fully disappeared. But real progress takes time. This serum is gentle and contains no harsh actives like retinol, Vitamin C, or chlorella which is really bad for skin and body in the long term. (Lookin at you, Kiehl’s!) Be patient, let the Caudalie formula do its thing; you’ll be so glad you invested the money in yourself. Yes it’s expensive, but no more costly than most Vitamin C or retinol products. In the long run, clean skin care with all-natural ingredients is so much better for your skin. I use this along with the Premier Cru serum and The Cream, and I’m so happy with skin that looks about 40, instead of 55. (See Before & After pics below.) No needles, lasers, chemical peels ever. Just younger looking, brighter skin that feels superb. As my adult daughter said, “You can really tell when people take good care of their skin, like my Mom does.”  :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if this product works for getting rid of dark spots or not. I like the very light scent of lemon and it absorbs nicely into my skin. My skin is very dry and now it feels much smoother. Maybe I would purchase again if not for the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum since the past 2 years now

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a forever product. I have been using it for 2 months now since I developed adult acne. Be patient with your skin and trial and error ladies. It is easy to overdue it but believe me less is more. Find the products that work for your skin and stick to it.  Listen to your skin it will tell you if you are overdoing g it...back off. Anyway this product is amazing for treating post inflammatory acne hyperpigmentation ( those dark spots). No result immediately but over 2 wk I noticed some improvement now if you combine it with Caudalie glycolic acid overnight treatment , Wow! It enhances the effect definitely a winner and yes expensive but believe me well worth. Once I am rid of the dark spot I will continue to use this alone.

I have been using for about 4 weeks now both morning and night and have noticed a substantial reduction in the dark spots. They are still present but much less pronounced. I bought the Caudalie Vinoperfecf 3 piece set and have also been using the moisturizer and essence along with this product in the evenings since purchasing. So that may also be helping !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

So I purchased it.  Two weeks in, my skin is less hydrated and my melasma is darker and more defined than ever. This product is making my skin barrier worse. Within one day of discontinuing use my skin started to improve.  I also really REALLY wish the company would eliminate the fragrance in this product. I’m accustomed to fragrance being in products, but it tends to be toward the end of the ingredient label. This serum has fragrance in the middle of the ingredient label. And you can tell the moment you use it, how strong the fragrance is. As a melasma sufferer, “fragrance” is on my radar for things that make it worse.

reviews.review_text: Not tacky, hydrating but not greasy Horrible hormonal acne recently—loved my routine that included this and the night cream from same line (woke up w plump, clear, and smooth skin). Just started retin-A so I can’t use the night cream since it has glycolic acid (trying to avoid/prevent the irritation, and peeling skin that retin-A can give you if you’re not careful of precise routine). But so glad to know I can still use this serum—has vinoferene which is a potent vitamin C but no AHA’s. Hoping it fades my scars and redness based on other reviews. Have never had a bad reaction to it, even before starting the retin-A. I love this stuff so far for my super sensitive, acne prone, oily, acne-scarred skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin

Awesome serum! After a few uses, I can noticed that my dark spots have gotten better!

reviews.review_title: I need a lighter foundation shade, so it works!

I think my skin looks good but I do a combination of things including the Mia about 4x a week, so it's hard to know if this is the secret sauce. It's certainly not making things worse, which is nice. But yeah, after a summer when usually my skin is darker, I noticed I had to buy a shade lighter foundation than I ever have before, even in the winter months. I have started using sunscreen daily too, but again, it's even lighter than it normally is during the winter months. Just last week I got compliments on my skin twice. I don't know how well it's working or not, but I'm hesitant to stop!

Now I’m older and my skin is dry, less acne but I have rosacea now. The serum worked great then and great now. Caudalie has amazing products that leave your skin feeling amazing. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. I received it in a reward kit and fell in love. I dark spots are slowly going away but much faster than I expected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a deluxe sample of this in a Sephora Play! box. After using it faithfully every morning for nearly two months, I saw ZERO difference in regards to treating hyperpigmentation or uneven skin tone. I also tried using it on the back of my hands, which have sun damage, and again saw no difference. And that doesn't surprise me - there is nothing in the ingredients list that suggests the ability of this product to treat dark spots. This is not a brightening treatment. It IS a pretty decent hydrating serum, thanks to the squalane and hyaluronic acid, which is the reason I gave two stars. But frankly there are much more effective products on the market for a fraction of the cost.  As for being 62 times better than Vitamin C? Absolute rubbish. First, there are NO scientific studies verifying this. Caudalie literally just made that claim up. Second, I went back to my Holy Grail vitamin C product (Derma e Vitamin C Concentrated Serum) after finishing my sample bottle, and within three days I saw brighter, more even-toned skin than anything I got using the Caudalie.  Stick to your regular vitamin C product, and don't buy into the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

This is the one thing that actually works for me. It works so well that I don't even think about not getting it because of the price tag. It is the one thing that completely evens out my skin and makes it glow all day. It fades dark spots so quickly. I always see improvement after just one week of use. It's also very lightweight and absorbs quickly. It also seems to prevent breakouts and improves the overall texture of the skin.
