reviews.review_text: I brought the tiny sample bottle to Bali with me for 3 weeks...when I got home I couldn’t get over my Bali glow...but I realized when I ran out of the tiny bottle (which lasted the whole trip) it was seriously this product. Grew up in south Florida with a lot of sun spots and also some acne scars. This product truly clears your skin. It feels so good on and is so hydrating. Nothing has ever made me so happy with my skin. Obviously it’s pricy so I’ve gone some time in between running out of a bottle and the difference is incredibly noticeable- I’m back to not wanting to leave the house without concealer until I repurchase another.  *I also have THE most sensitive skin with excema and perioral dermatitis and this is the only serum that I can use without irritation when I have a flair up.  HOLY GRAIL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely on the pricey side of serums but trust me when I saw GLOWY, CLEAR, PORELESS skin. I have had comments from my facialist about how my pores have vanished! Acne scars? GONE! I highly highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS STUFF!! I don't have a ton of unevenness but I do have very sensitive dry skin and I've noticed a huge difference with this serum. Yes, it is expensive but I would say a well worth investment if you have the cash!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started using this with a lux sample, liked it so much that now I bought a full size. It’s been amazing at removing my chin acne scarring (I have olive skin).  It’s gentle but efficient. Can be used during the day or night (unlike some acids or retinol)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like my sun damaged skin has really become supple again when I use this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered this product a few years back thru a 500 point rewards and It’s been one of my staple products ever since. It’s always been very effective for me when wanting to reduce blemish scars and to keep my skin looking radiant. Doesn’t strip my skin, doesn’t irritate and has a very light scent to it. Great alternative if you’re sensitive to Vitamin C or looking for a Clean product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Holy moly. I have combo-oily skin, adult acne, and uneven skin tone. This combined with my YTP cleanser has been life changing. I got a sample size of this stuff, and I’ve been using it for about two weeks now. I woke up THIS morning and noticed that my acne has subsided, my skin tone looks more even, and I have a definite glow. I will definitely be buying the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I stopped buying skin care from Sephora when I simply realized it’s overpriced and doesn’t really work for my skin concerns. I decided to give a try to this serum and the Kale facewash and my skin start breaking out and became very congested. I haven’t had deep skin congestion in months. I’m gonna be returning this products and will stick with my Avene face wash, haba labo face gel and aloe vera. My skin feels light and plumped with my old skincare routine so I’m done with Sephora skin care line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this and took away a lot of the redness from fading acne marks. However, I do not know if this is worth the price for me personally. Paying this price tag to get of some redness did not seem like the best use of my money personally however, I do not have extreme redness, just on older acne spots.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: one of my favorite products! it’s been in my routine for about 2 years. i use it usually just in the morning, but if i want a little more moisture i use it at night mixed in with a sleeping mask. the only issue is the price. it works, but it’s not really worth the splurge when there are almost definitely other products that can give the same results for cheaper, just have to make the time to find them

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This does a beautiful job at brightening the skin and making it look younger and healthier. And it smells like grapes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the full size after using a sample size for a few weeks. I wanted to see if it would really help my post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation from acne. Firstly, when you apply this product it's extremely sticky on the skin. I thought I could look past it, but I've concluded that I cannot stand products that make me feel like my skin is sticky and dirty. Additionally, I noticed only minor improvement after using this product for over 3 months which at a price range of 80 dollars; is not very impressive. I will not be repurchasing this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this for months and I loved the way it made my skin feel. It was moisturizing and on the thicker side, but didn’t do much in terms of getting rid of dark marks or evening out my skin tone. It was too expensive and there were little results but this may be good for drier skin types!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY GRAIL OF ALL TIME! Be patient! It works its magic and is soo gentle which is critical in maintain the actual health and quality of your skin. I have so many deep pitted acne scars and I use this serum every other day along with the Primere Cru Rich Cream and the Primere eye cream and my  face looks DRAMATICALLY BETTER! I work in skincare and I've tried everything, Caudalie ain't playin' y'all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve tried a ton of skincare lines- out of my own pocket. I know everyone’s skin is so different but I struggle with oil, congested pores, very visible pores and occasional hormonal cystic acne...... slight texture issues and SOME discoloring. Anyway...... this product I cannot say enough about. It’s amazing. It completely elevated my skin and it is glowing. I use it in conjunction with the sorbet and that’s it! Seriously worth the try...I also get occasional chemical peels and I will say that has also made a huge difference I think getting one at least once a month plus these products have changed my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have only went out of my way to write beauty reviews for one other product- Clinique Acne solutions foaming cleanser. This product cleared my skin a lot but didn’t necessarily completely take away my acne and didn’t help with acne scars. I am a 26 YO female with acne on chin and cheeks. This has been the holy grail and people noticed my skin immediately. I first used the sample from my PLAY box and within a few days of use my skin clarity was completely different. I had a dewy but not oily look (a healthy look), my pores had shrunk, and after finally buying the full size product a few weeks (total) my acne scars are lightened. I haven’t had one breakout at all. I got compliments of my skin on an unfiltered Instagram picture and in person at work when I hardly had any makeup on. I am more confident since my skin has healed up and can’t wait to continue to use it so my skin can finally after 26 years become perfection!! $79 dollars is a lot but so worth it for good skin. Highly recommend!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first used this serum 12 years ago for acne and I LOVE it. I have tried lots of serums in the past 12 years and I can honestly say this is still the best and I always go back to it. I don’t know what is in this serum that makes it so great but I love it. It hydrates your skin without being heavy, it absorbs nicely, and it truly get rid of dark spots and acne! I highly recommend this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve nearly finished using this serum and have seen no difference in radiance, skin tone or dark spots. I don’t understand the reason for the great reviews. I only gave it two stars for the clean beauty stamp so I know I didn’t waste my time and money putting toxic things into my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Where do I even start..? I love that there are immediate and long term results with this serum. My complexion instantly looks more radiant and healthy after using this. My skin went through a change and I started breaking out with large, cystic acne that in turn left little marks on my cheeks and this has been doing an incredible job at reducing the pigmentation of them. My skin type is normal with the occasional breakout. I use this morning and night in replace of a moisturizer and I could not be more happy with the result. I will be purchasing again, and again, and again...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I notice more of a glow and smoothness after one use of this product. I have not been able to try it long term as I only had a sample of this. But from my one use I would recommend. No irritation from my sensitive skin.

reviews.review_title: I need this more than mascara and lipstick!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

I got this sample and immediately noticed an improvement. I feel like the results justify the expense. I love this and will continue to purchase!  I’m 52 and grew up on the beach.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing serum. I have had a few dark spots and after about a week of using this serum, they are almost completely gone. makes my skin soft but not too oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You NEED this. Seriously i love this product, i was super skeptical with the claims it was making but my skin has never looked better i have been using this product for about 2 months now, i use it daily and i have seen such an improvement in skin tone eveness as well as my acne scars diminishing i love this product so much, my acne scars were light pink but super stubborn and wouldnt go away this product has helped so much cant say enough it smells nice not strong at all. reviews.review_text: I love the brand Caudalie because they have high quality formulas that work, and they donate 1% of sales to plant trees! This is a CLEAN beauty product which is always nice. It claims to be an oil-free brightening serum 60something x more potent than vitamin c. I love the look this gives my skin immediately. it instantly brightens my face and subtly illuminates my features without being too intense. it wears really well under moisturizer, sunscreen, and makeup. I LOVE the packaging with the little glass dropper, i WISH mine had come in that!! I would definitely recommend this product!

I also love that even if I'm wearing makeup it makes my skin radiant. What I also love about this is it feels cool on my skin unlike other serum. It's just a radiance in a bottle for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is literally perfect for all skin types. It has helped my acne so much as well as removes dark spots and acne scaring. Plus it’s 60x better at brightening than vitamin C! Crazy good

reviews.review_title: So great for texture and evening skin tone!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much! I am only on day 2 of using it 2x a day but I already see a difference. I had texture, just small bumps under the skin, on my cheeks and chin and it’s 95% gone. It also evened out my skin tone and has lessened redness. I feel like this might be a holy grail product for me!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: FYI-I waited until I finished the entire bottle to write a proper review. I'm kind of upset I spent $80 on this serum. When I first started using it, I developed these small, red bumps around my nose and mouth. I thought my skin was just reacting to a new product and thought it would get used to it-but it didn't. I kept using it anyways because I thought for sure my skin would eventually improve-definitely did not improve. It's been about 2 weeks since I ran out of it and my skin is free of those bumps. I honestly should have just returned it after the first month of using it but the reviews were so good that I thought my skin would turn around. overall I wouldn't recommend this item and I won't be giving it a 2nd chance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite vitamin C serum! I am on my 3rd bottle. I use it every morning under a moisturizer and sunscreen. I have noticed a reduction in the appearance of acne scars and it helps brighten my skin. I have never experienced any skin irritation whilst using this serum.  I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum. It has done wonderful things to my face. Walked into a Sephora store and asked an associate to help me with a nice serum to help even my acne prone skin. I was a little hesitant because of the price, but lucky for me the sample size was available for free with purchase. I tried it and loved it. Love the dispenser, so easy to apply to face. I eventually bought the full size because I am scared to run out of this magic portion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful serum! Hydrating but highly effective and cleaning/minimizing pores and evening out skin tone. Please Caudalie stop selling in China!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the clean-ish ingredients in this serum. It's super balancing, if not hydrating, for those days when your skin needs a bit of nourishment and to look its best the following day. Would recommend!

reviews.review_title: Better results than using other Vitamin C
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m usually not one that thrives on instant results but this Serum, even after one use, does the best job of brightening and evening out skin tone. It’s more fragranced than I prefer, but it’s still not even close to being as scented as most skincare. Caudalie is a brand I often forget about but when I try it again I remember all those great skin days I had while using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

The change isn’t drastic and it took about a month for me to start seeing results but this definitely changed the texture of my skin, reduced the appearance of darks marks, and does not cause any new acne

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum worked in just a few weeks on my acne scars.  I have combination skin and it did not make me oily. Perfect serum for evening out your complexion. I loved this serum.

reviews.review_text: I dont know If I should but I mix a tiny drop with my foundation and it's a heavenly mix. Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i am officially obsessed with this product. I have dry, uneven, sensitive, blemish prone skin. My derm has me on meds because of it. I received this as part of a sample or code with one of my orders. It was a tiny bottle but boy did it last. I used it once a day for a couple weeks. little goes a long way. I've been out of it for about a week now. I definitely notice the difference it made in my skin in so many ways now. i hate the price but im hoping a bigger bottle will last awhile since the small one did. My skin tone was more even, smoother looking, softer feeling, less belmishes and so radient. i just had this glow i havent found with any other product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed at how much I love this product. I have had terrible acne and dark marks since I moved down south. After getting a facial with extractions, I really noticed how much my dark marks increased from the acne I had been suffering from for the past 6 months. I was in the need of something to correct the pigmentation and moisturize a bit, but was waiting on a shipment for a new moisturizer, when I remembered I had a sample of this from Sephora! Sooo glad I remembered it because my skin LOVES this serum. Being African-American it can be hard to find something to get rid of dark marks quickly, but not bleach my skin. The Vinoperfect is a miracle in a tiny bottle that I seen results after 2 days of using. It's been a week now and my skin is looking fabulous! I would normally NEVER think to spend this much on a product but it's and absolute must for me now. I will definitely be purchasing a full size when I run-out.

Major kudos to Caudalie for putting so many of their products in glass vessels instead of plastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

Within a week spots have faded so much, I cannot wait to see what my skin looks like in a month. I will never be w/o this! I use it both AM and PM. I’m astonished at how fast I’ve seen results.

Plus it has a lot of Vitamin C which is actually good for your skin and prevents damage from free radicals. I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I‘ve been on the hunt for a new serum after I was left with brown spots on my cheeks caused by a bad reaction to a Vitamin C serum. My old serum did nothing to remove the spots and I was beginning to think that i was stuck with the discoloration forever.  I did some research and bought this serum along with the essence. I noticed an almost immediate difference in my skin: by day three, my skin looked brighter and felt completely moisturized, something I’ve never felt even with my favorite moisturizer. After a full week, my skin is still glowing and the discoloration from using the other serum is almost gone! I’m excited to see what the next few weeks bring because the serum and essence have already exceeded my expectations. I’m incredibly impressed with this line and would highly recommend this serum!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin looked radiant after using this serum. The smell took getting used to but I like how it works.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have finally found a skincare line that literally aligns with the heavens. My skin is over the moon happy with every single Caudalie product I've tried and this serum is no exception. I use it almost twice a day when I can and I actually don't bother wearing much makeup anymore since trying it. My skin is hydrated, soft and illuminated. The price is a little Meh...but you get codes with the product boxes to register on Caudalie's website and you can start earning free products over time. Worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this first in my sephora play box, then went into sephora and used my points to get another sample. Wanted to make sure this was truly worth spending the money. Well it is. Went and made the full size purchase. I apply this after my toner and before my moisturizer under my makeup and my skin feels and looks great. Ever since using this product I truly believe that my foundation application even looks better. Definitely recommend this product and now I'm looking forward to trying more products from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It didn't break me out, but it also didn't do much for my uneven skin tone. I ended up giving it away to my sister.

reviews.review_title: My holy Grail for acne scars
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I use this serum twice a day. It doesn't break me out or make my combo-oily skin feel dry or very oily. Helps clear up small pimples and makes my face overall more even toned and makes my post-acne hyperpigmentation less noticable. After consistent use for a few months my skin is in much better shape than before. I ran out of this serum for two weeks and my skin immediately broke out and was more red than it had been when I was using the serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nothing has made a quicker and more noticeable change to my acne and pore size than this!  I got this with the moisturizer as the bday gift last year and I will definitely be purchasing the full size when it runs out.  I have combination skin and this is light and matte enough to use under moisturizer without making my skin look oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I originally got this is a tester from Sephora and just after one nights use I woke up with glowing skin after one week of using my acne spots and sun spots started to clear I havnt had this clear of a completion ever in my life this is my holy grail serum for sure!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, the scent it nice. I put on and my face had a wonderful glow that I've been lacking. on my day off I just wear this product with no makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for two years and love it.  I have rosacea and eczema prone symptoms and this product not only relieves those symptoms, but leaves my skin moisturized and evens skin tone. I have paid much more $$$ for so much less !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. The results were evident within two weeks.

reviews.review_title: Great skin texture and color correction
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love! I got a sample a while back and used it for two weeks. My skin was GLOWING. Had some spots leftover from pms breakouts and I saw noticeable and significant improvement. Had to buy the full size. I felt the pice point was high but for the improvement I saw in my skin, decided it’s more than worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve seen a lot of bloggers recommend it, but It didn’t work on me. The serum is so sticky and you have to use a moisturizer after applying it. Didn’t give me the glow or radiance I was hoping to see. It smelled like rose water which I don’t like. It didn’t work for me but it could work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke out within a few days of trying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed brighter, more even toned skin after only a few uses. I have melasma spots from birth control that are finally lightening after 10 years! Only complaint is the price but it’s worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually write reviews, but this product deserves it. I had overnight results, my skin is incredibly soft, pores smaller, and acne scars lighter. This is my 3rd night using the sample! I wake up with glowing skin and my boyfriend even said i looked unusually pretty for just waking up HAHA!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dull skin with quite a bit of scarring and pretty much every serum I’ve tried has caused my skin to break out in small bumps everywhere. So I finally decided to splurge on this and it is amazing!! I noticed that my skin was starting to look brighter almost immediately and it has not made me break out at all. This layers well under makeup, so I’ve been using it morning and night. It’s been less than a month that I’ve been using this and it’s already started to immensely improve my skin’s texture and appearance. I can’t wait to see how my skin looks once I finish this bottle, and I will definitely be repurchasing

reviews.review_title: So worth it! Nothing else like it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is worth every single cent. I originally received a trail size in for my birthday and fell in love. ***Best skin I’ve ever had*** After looking it up to buy a full size of the product, I honestly resisted. I have wasted much more money trying to fill it’s shoes with other serums and NOTHING came remotely close. So I did what I should have done in the first place and bought it at my closest Sephora. I was pleasantly surprised to see how much 1 ounce of product will go and this bottle will last me a long time even using it twice daily. So all in all, don’t be like me and waste money looking for a cheaper alternative, you get what you pay for with this and it’s EXCELLENT quality. I noticed a positive difference in my skin within days!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product along with many others from Caudalie. It's light weight and have seen a difference with just a few days of using it. This will be added to my go to skin line products ☺

reviews.review_title: Love Caudalie but not this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this twice thinking that maybe it takes a longer amount of time for dark spots to lighten and for skin to glow but it turns out it was a waste of money. It smelled fresh and felt nice for absorption; however, it didn't deliver its promises.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very very sensitive skin and this is one of the rare products that really work for me. So good, but so expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you use this everyday in your skincare routine it will change your skin. I get so many compliments on my skin when using this.  it is pricey tho.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was very concerned with the chemical smell from this product since I have very sensitive skin but I tried it anyway and my skin reacted just fine and I like the glow it gives to my skin. Will definitely consider buying the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m halfway through the bottle. I’ve used it morning and night for almost four months. It gives my skin a tiny glow. It has not lightened my faint age spots. I have super resistant skin that is easily clogged. That my be keeping me from getting as good results as others have. In general, I think Caudalie is a nice product line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I leave this on my face for 1 minute and it started to get red. Won’t recommend this for sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Magic in a bottle. It’s luxurious and effective. Unfortunately, I can justify the price but will continue to use my Sephora points.  Within a day I see results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels like silky water, smells like standing in the forest in the rain. My skin is so supple. Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never been softer! Love, love!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot express how much this product has improved my skins radiance! My small blemishes have gone away and I get so many compliments on my skin. I am forever sold on this product—-i don’t even need to use foundation on a daily basis Because my skin just looks better without it!

reviews.review_title: I didnt like it....then I LOVED it.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I remember receiving a sample of this serum in my 20's and thinking meh, I dont see anything happening here and so I forgot about it. Then I again received a trial size in some random order a while back.... I'll be 36 this year and I missed this once I ran out. I only used it in the morning under my makeup but I loooved the smooth and not too hydrated feel it gave my skin. When it comes to my skin care products I never go heavy handed and I feel like the amount in the small dropper was a perfect about to rub together in my hands and smooth over the face, so this products lasts a while. My skin, no matter what time of month, never reacted badly to this. The scent is light and dissipates quickly.  Would purchase again and again.

reviews.review_title: too pricey but good sample size
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly went ahead with a purchase I was waiting on because I saw the deluxe sample size was either a free sample or a points purchase (I can't remember which one it was just recently) but like I really appreciate how it makes my skin feel, but I feel like the price tag is far too high for me to ever legitimately purchase and use regularly because I'd be worried to waste it on everyday me. I'm just not there yet $$$ wise.  I also have had this in a play box.   I will always order the sample size of this if it's a pack in/points purchase. it's just too expensive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this products using my Sephora points, I read the reviews and had high hopes for a it! As soon as I used it on my skin my face started feeling itchy and hot!! The serum also feels like it's tacky and just sits on top of the skin. I had to wash my face after 20 minutes of having it on bc it was so itchy. Wasted my points for nothing! Beware if you have sensitive skin not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best serum, completely changed the texture and balance of my skin for the best! This is a life product for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum gives your skin such a beautiful glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love it! makes my skin glow

reviews.review_title: High Quality product- it's worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is like a Holy Grail for my skin. As I've aged my skin has become more complicated. This serum gives my skin a more youthful glow and i can definitely see a difference.  I've been using it long enough that I am comfortable going without full makeup, just apply skin care products, cc-cream, mascara and lip gloss, and out the door. This serum is a game changer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried the free sample for a week and fell in love. I have REALLY sensitive skin, like, rub it and it reddens instantly, I’ve never found a sunblock that doesn’t make me break out. But this stuff has not only been safe on my skin, it’s improved the tone, clarity, and even the texture of my skin after using morning and night for just a week. The final verdict was when I went to dinner with a friend from out of town who I hadn’t seen for a year. She asked if I was pregnant, stunned and a little offended I said no and asked why she asked. “Oh it’s just your skin is like glowing, it looks so good!” Needless to say I’ve already put a full bottle in my shopping cart and will be adding this to my normal skin care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best product I have ever put on my skin. That is a bold claim because I have spent literally thousands on skincare and NOTHING has improved my skin with such amazing results as the vino serum. I absolutely cannot live without this wonderful little gem. Of course I wish it was more affordable but as it is sorcery magic in a bottle, I understand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finally found a serum that does it all! My skin is glowing, fresh, hydrated and toned! Worth every penny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all I love that the dropper is angled so you can get that last bit of product! This serum does everything it claims to, i would 100% try this out if you suffer from dark spots (post acne)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Will see brightening affect after a few days of used. Haven’t used it long enough to see if it helps with hyperpigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love me some serums. I use the vinoperfect essence already and this serum lays on top beautifully. It’s hydrating and light. So good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum. At first, I was only using it a few times a week and not seeing much of a difference. When I began using it twice a week under my moisturizer, I started seeing minor results in about two weeks. A few months later, my complexion is much brighter and my skin tone is far more even. It has a pleasant scent and my skin truly does feel radiant after using it!

reviews.review_title: Fragrance - not suitable for sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This includes fragrance.  I'm tired of companies advertising products suitable for sensitive skin when they contain fragrance.  This already irritates my skin and I put it on 10 minutes ago.  Sephora, please make sure products that contain fragrance are not marked for sensitive skin - this is very deceptive and obviously inaccurate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: got this in my play box and loved it. was able to grab it again with my points and it wasn't a dupe. this product brightens, brings a healthy flush to my skin, and makes my skin feel healthy. can't wait to buy the big one!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: All 5 Stars!!!! I have some dark spots and small, but noticeable acne scars. I’ve been looking for years for a product that would do the magic trick and slowly fade the spots. I’ve been using the Tarte Maracuja oil every morning and night also taking Sephora collection Olly Glowing Skin and sure enough the spots were slowly going away. I got this as a trial with a recent purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum and it’s always been great for me, however, I just got a new bottle and upon application my entire face has turned red and itchy :( hopefully a one time deal and won’t happen again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the very first time I write a review because of this product. It worth every penny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First serum that really works! I can see the difference. Makes my skin color even.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. It’s super gentle. I use it both morning and night right after my toner and right before my moisturizer. I let it soak into my skin a bit before I move on in my skin care routine. It has been great for helping my discoloration. I have rosacea and I have noticed I’m not as red since using this product. I also find that it really has made my skin brighter. It has a much more youthful glow since using this product. I will be buying this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will never use another serum again. This product is light, refreshing, and in my opinion a miracle worker. I happened upon it from a sample and after a month using it ordered the full product. I had dark spots that have completely faded since I started using it. My skin looks healthy and radiant. And as one dealing with the redness of rosacea it did not remove it (nor did I expect that) but it does surprisingly dull out a good amount of the redness all day. Even my husband noticed a difference in my skin after only a week of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is stuff is AMAZING! I was sent a sample from Sephora. I had it for weeks before I decided to use it and when I did, boy, did my skin perform a beauty radiating transformation! Although, It’s a bit pricey, I’m already on my second bottle! Some days I want to skip the foundation by using this stuff all I need is a little concealer for a pick me up! It does last a long time and all you need is a few drops daily! My dark spots and discoloring is virtually gone. This lil baby is like MAGIC in a jar!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best skin care products I have ever used

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product nightly for a month now and I’m so pleased to see a transformation on my skin. My dark spots are lightening and I swear by this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite serum. Hydrating, tones, radiating. Leaves a luminous finish after application that is gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: INCREDIBLE! I saw results in my face within two weeks of using this product faithfully morning and night, in addition to whenever I got out of the shower. I received this in my Sephora Play Box as a sample and will definitely be purchasing it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this serum. It's hydrating, smoothing, calming, all in one. Definitely one of my favorite steps in my skincare routine and my favorite serum ever. Great if you have:  •acne scars •dry skin •redness •flakyness  I had all of the above and maybe it didn't cure it on its own but I know it did a lot

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It pains me to write this review because I am a huge Caudalie fan, but this product made my face breakout with small red bumps EVERYWHERE. Wouldn’t recommend to someone with oily and acne prone skin

reviews.review_title: RADIANCE: A+... BUT DARK SPOTS REMAIN
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this from my point redemption a little while back but never used it. I went to a couple different places and they all said this was the best to get rid of my freckles/dark spots so I bought more. I’ve been using it religiously for a week now. My face has never looked so GLOWY and radiant!! But no change to my dark spots. We shall see if it makes a diff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and will continue rebuying every time I run out, even though it’s pricy. I feel like it gives my skin a beautiful texture and really does help minimize dark spots and pores. Obviously not every dark spot, but I feel like it just helps the overall look and feel of my skin. You only need a few drops at a time so it lasts for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I originally received this Caudalie Vinoperfect Serum as a sample. I became an instant Fan. The absolute BEST Radiance Serum I have ever used. And I've used several. I am on my third bottle and hope the formula never changes. I highly recommend this serum for dry skin as well as those with fine lines and a general dullness in aging skin.   My skin is silky soft after two years of use. I actually noticed a hydrated glow and smoothness after only a few weeks of use. I sometimes use this serum twice a day, and always pair it with my moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely worth the money. I have really noticed a difference in my complexion. I have some discoloration from cystic acne and this has helped fade those spots quicker than anything else I've tried. I use 2-3 drops at night, I focus the product mostly in my problem areas and then work it into the rest of my face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I discovered this product when Sephora was giving out trial size samples for Beauty Insider birthdays. I made that little bottle last a long time because I wanted the full size but couldn't bear to spend that much. I finally took the plunge and I have not regretted it for a second. I use a few drops once a day and it has lasted me 9 months. I drop it into my palm, rub my hands together, and pat it gently onto my face. I used to use the dropper to deposit the product onto my face but that ended up being way too much at a time. I am nearing the end of my bottle and I am very sad. This has helped my overall skin tone and helps my skin look hydrated and soft. I will be purchasing another one soon.

reviews.review_title: Love it! Deminished my pregnancy spots within days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a serum pregnancy safe and with clean ingredients, vinoperfect highly exceeds my expectations.. I will buy again!  Really mild smell, in case you are smell sensitive (which is me now with the pregnancy)  Absorbs really fast and the dropper makes is easy to apply. I was hoping to diminish some dark spots that has intensified now than I am pregnant. It worked!!! Within days... I am so happy with this product... I will try more Claudalie products from now on!

reviews.review_title: 3 Days and already diminished sun damage spots!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I find it very odd that there aren't more people in my age range writing reviews for products (over 50...that's all I'm gonna say ;-D ) This serum is fantastic. I picked it up as one of my 'free gifts for points' at the register in a Sephora store. I have only been using it for about 3 days, and I can already see the brown spots from sun damage diminished. I'm doing a test on how good it really is by putting the serum on my left arm only to reduce sun damage and age spots, so that I can see the comparison. Wish me luck!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Magic in a bottle, after the first use I noticed how soft my skin felt and with continued use my skin has become brighter and my complexion is so good! I’ve also noticed a decrease in my acne which has been a huge plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The mother of all serums! Although expensive, this product delivers! My acne scars are lighter, and my skin has never looked this radiant, nor has it ever felt this smooth. It has also helped minimize my pores like no other product has. This is a light weight serum, and in my opinion, a little goes a long way. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'll be honest, I was skeptical when I got a sample of this in my Play box but figured I'd give it a shot. And oh boy am I a convert. The little jar I got lasted a long time so the full size should as well! It soaks into the skin beautifully, smells amazing, and doesn't irritate or dry out my (sensitive, dry) skin. And best of all it actually does what it says it does! I have acne scars and rosacea and this made a visible difference in how my skin looked. I didn't even use it twice a day (I just used it at night) and it still helped. With a bigger jar I plan to use it twice a day and see if it happens faster.

reviews.review_title: Radiant with a Side of Fabulous
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this product about two years ago when they gave out the small bottle for the birthday gift. Right away I noticed a difference. My skin was more radiant, softer, and my makeup looked fabulous! I wanted the full size bottle but didn’t think 80$ was worth it. A few days ago I changed my mind. I had had it with my dull skin with dry patches. This product is worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My holy grail product! Absolutely amazing, I can’t live without it!! The radiance and glow it gives my skin is something I can’t get with any other product!! I will re-purchase forever! Super hydrating too! The glow is just something I can’t get anywhere else!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: just about the only play box constant. Its great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brightening serum is so good! It is great for dark spots. I can already see a difference. It’s also perfect for uneven skin ton which I suffer from. I’ve only used two weeks but my complexion is brighter already.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for over a month and didn’t see any difference on my face!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Results within a week.  This was apart of a Caudalie trio- cleanser and mask. I used twice a day and saw results within 4 days.  Worth the price. I tried Luna’s and it seems more “ strong” to skin while this formula is gentle. Gentle to skin. Will repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely a five star product, and worth every penny!!! This is the most I've spent on a single product, and I'd do it again lol. Leaves skin refreshed, hydrated, even toned, and glowing. Basically several products in one! A MUST HAVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin unfortunately has a lot more issues with breakouts after I started using this than before. I love how glow-y it makes my skin but hate that I have had a couple giant pimples show up on my cheek since beginning my trial. I was about to purchase a regular sized bottle but I am not sure if its a good idea given what I am dealing with. Its sad because I do believe this helps with dark spots so maybe a spot treatment is better for me. My skin is just too sensitive for it, every week I see a new pimple that leaves a dark spot :( While on one hand it feels like its helping clear my spots, its also bringing a big one in the same area so now I have 3-4 hyper pigmentation spots that was clear before starting my sephora play trial size :( :(

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! I never really do reviews but this is worthy of one. Within 2 days of using this product I have seen my acne scars lighten dramatically! I have never had a product actually do what it says. I can’t even imagine the results i’ll see over the next week or two!

Got this in a sample box during black Friday, and I FINALLY used it and for the first time in months, I've gone a week without peeling, redness, or dryness on my face. I was surprised to find that it costs so much, but honestly at this point I'm happy to find something that works, and am happy to pay for a high quality product after searching for something that will help me from flaking while at sea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m a college student who can’t really afford to spend on pricier things, but this serum was an exception because I was so wowed by the trial size I had gotten. I ended up dropping the $ on the full size bottle in December and it’s now February. I’ve been consistently using this in the AM and PM every day and have gone through about 1/4 of the bottle. This serum is so legit.... I’m writing this review today cause I noticed this morning that my skin tone has really evened up, and it’s the first product that has actually done this for me. The radiance and glow effect of this serum is something you get from day 1, which I loved. But now the actual dullness and spots of my skin tone...I’m just so impressed! If it’s only been a couple months and I’m seeing these kinds of results, I’m super curious to see what my skin will be like a year from now. I can confidently say this is my fav serum and this has reached holt grail status in my routine. Other than the steep price, I can see myself continuing to buy this for a very long time.   For reference, my skin type is generally oily and dehydrated with the monthly burst of acne. I think this serum plus the gokujyun premium really saved my skins moisture barrier.

reviews.review_title: This serum and essence have changed my life
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a pretty low-maintenance skin care routine now.  For the past couple of years I tried to improve my skin with Deciem products - I’ve struggled with visible pores, dark spots, sun damage. All of the acids and peels and vitamin c serums I’ve tried in the past had left my skin dry, irritated, and visibly patchy.  I had a 500 pt reward and redeemed it for the Caudalie set it included this serum, the Vinoperfect Essence and the moisturizing sherbet lotion. I honestly just tried it, because I had it sitting under my sink. After just a couple days of use, folks were asking me if I was on some new clean eating regimen (I was not!). After a month I really noticed a huge improvement in my skin altogether: it was glowing, balanced in moisture, no longer oily in patches, the dark spots were gone... I was seriously in awe. Then I had sticker shock when I decided to buy full sized bottles.  But I sucked it up and bought both the essence and the serum and I couldn’t be happier.  My evening skin routine is so fast (I’m notoriously lazy about skin care before bed). I use a micellar water to wipe my face clean, then I apply a balancing toner from Origins. I splash about three shakes of the essence into the palm of my hand, pat my hands together and gently press the essence into my face. While my skin is still damp from the essence I apply a few drops of this serum evenly over my face and neck. And that’s it! I don’t even need to add another moisturizer, my skin can breathe at night and my face looks dewy and glowing in the morning. Now, I don’t have to wear any makeup on my face (no BB cream, foundation, concealer or tinted moisturizer...) so I’m saving loads of time prepping for my day.  A parent I was speaking to was telling me that she was so much older than me, and when she learned that we were actually the same age- she was shocked.  Despite the price tag on this line, as long as you dispense the minimal amount of product - it will last a very long time.

reviews.review_title: In spite of myself, I think it works!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to everyone else who wrote the helpful reviews on this, which led to my doubtfully purchasing online without testing it first, as a birthday treat. I figured I could always return it. I've been using it about a week in the morning under my sunscreen (I don't wear foundation), and my skin is so much smoother, and yes, indeed, more radiant. Way less random clogginess under the surface. I feel like I still have some discoloration from zits gone by, but they seem not as bad. The only thing it hasn't really done is shrink my pores.  Big props to the Sephora search/browsing machine and customer ratings engine, because this is not a price point or brand/packaging that I would usually be drawn to.

reviews.review_title: my new holy grail skincare product!

I wish I could give it 10 stars. It has changed the appearance of my scars... they are lighter and my skin is glowing. it was truly amazing. I couldn't believe it. People were amazed and thought I had surgery. Once these samples are done, I will be buying the full size. Like I said, this product is life changing for someone like me.

My dry skin absolutely loves this stuff; I think it's one of the most hydrating serums I've ever used and it does a great job of really penetrating and absorbing into my skin. After just over a week of daily usage, I've definitely noticed it has evened out my skin tone and my complexion appears brighter. It seems much more effective than many vitamin C serums I've used. I've liked a lot of Caudalie's products, but this is my absolute favorite and worth checking out if you're looking for a brightening serum for dry skin.

I'm not a huge fan of the scent, but it doesn't bother me too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As a teenager who has been struggling with her skin for years, I am astonished as to how well this product works for me. I spend over $200 with my dermatologist and haven't seen results even close to when starting this product. I noticed results after 2 days, and now with two weeks of use my skin is like glass. I am very impressed since receiving in my October Sephora Play-box. I have sensitive, acne-prone skin and finally feel a sense of relief I haven't felt in such a long time. It all comes down to what you're willing to pay, taking into consideration how much I've spent with doctors appointments and topical's, it is definitely worth it.

reviews.review_text: used for the first time last night on a clean face w/no acne/bumps ,first thing I noticed it was greasy & never absorbed even w/the tiniest bit,figured oh well I'm going to bed anyway. woke up to a face full of zits. this is the third highly rated product I have tried of theirs (only because I keep getting them in beauty subscription boxes & Everytime this brand breaks me out something to a new degree like I'm a post pubescent teen !never again caudalie !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great result and truly does what it promised perfectly. Worth to have it as daily face serum.

reviews.review_title: Made no difference to my hyperpigmentation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this serum for about two years before switching over to the Vinosource SOS. I have some hyperpigmentation from sun damage and I have to say, this serum make zero difference. It is a good serum--pleasant smell, hydrates--but the Vinosource serum does just a good job and is $30 cheaper a bottle. The dropper is also much less convenient than the pump on the Vinosource serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how it feels and smells great but I have started breaking out .. maybe it’s the weather change but I’ll keep using and see how it goes. It’s the only new product I’ve added lately. But great feel!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best skincare products I have ever tried! Had quickly results, totally buying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the packaging. I like the smell. It did make my skin look more radiant (in my opinion). I just didn't really like the way it felt in my face. It felt sort of sticky and a little greasy. I don't think it's really helped my acne, so I don't think I want to use it anymore.

reviews.review_title: Patience is key with this one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Natural products take more time to visibly notice results. I highly recommend this product. Not only has this lighten my post acne spots, but my skin seems more vibrant when I use it. I apply with my AM skincare and PM skincare. Product does last, Ive had this since mid July- I’m not even half way through the bottle. One full squeeze is perfect for entire face:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this in the October play box comp from Influenster and I must say that I’m not going to incorporate serums into my routine because this has mad a major difference and I’m here for it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample and ended up getting the whole bottle. My skin is so used to this serum Now that if I don't use it my skin feels dull!' This stuff is amazing and absorbs in to the skin so well and leaves you glowing. Sadly I tried To try new products and just stopping Using this made my skin bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this serum. It doesn't leave your skin sticky. Melts into the skin and hydrates better than expected. I received this from influenster to test and I'm definitely buying the full size product when I run out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Since using this serum my face has become even with the same skin tone. I honestly really liked this serum. This product was sent to me by Sephora October box complimentary from Influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this product. I recommend it to everyone I know. I initially received a sample-size of this product as my Sephora birthday gift two years ago. With that small sample vial, I found that the rosacea around my cheeks and my laugh line to completely disappear. I mean completely! I use this serum in the morning and evening after toning and before moisturizing. It made a huge difference in my skin. When used in conjunction with the Vinoperfect Brightening Essence, my skin is noticeably brighter. I do not even need to wear any foundation anymore after using these products together. I fully recommend. Your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a product that would lighten splotchy spots on my face from the sun. Before this, I’d tried so many things but this is so different! After only a few weeks, I can see the dark splotches lightening but my overall skin texture and tone is noticeably softer, smoother and fine lines are disappearing! I love this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has dulled my brown spots within a short period of time, thankfully! I’m not thrilled over the stickiness it leaves but worth the results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good! I purchased this as a suggestion for something similar to vitamin C that wouldn’t break me out. I love how I literally only need two tiny drops for my entire face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skin feels very smooth after using this serum. I’m not a huge fan of the applicator which made it difficult and timely to apply. Given the price and annoying applicator, I brought it down to 4 stars.  I received this product complimentary for testing from influenster.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a trial-size of this product in my PLAY! By Sephora October box complimentary from Influenster. I can see why this product is “highly priced.” This is my first time using a face serum and I am really impressed. It blends in smooth without the feeling of greasiness or stickiness. I may just consider purchasing the full bottle. Haven’t had any breakouts either since I have been using this product (for about a week).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow this stuff is incredible but so expensive that I won’t be able to afford it aside from me free sample. Honestly though, it does make a clear difference with smooth color across my face, moisturizing, and makes me glow with or without makeup on top! Highly recommend if you can look past the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary item from Influenster for the October play box and and this product fades my acne scars and makes my skin smoother, and a glowing look. I highly recommend. I have oily skin as well and did not break out using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love serums and they have become part of my morning and night routine.  I used Cuadalíe Vinoperfect Serum during my morning routine.  Personally, I noticed a difference during one use so I am excited to see the difference in the next couple weeks.    I certainly plan to integrate into my permanent routine if the results are better with time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this product the second I received it. The texture is amazing and very light on your skin, it leaves you with a healthy glow! This product smells amazing as well, It didn’t break me out once. I will definitely purchase again, it’s worth every penny for someone who struggles with acne. I fortunately received this product in my October Play VoxBox as a complimentary from Influenster! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this serum so much! The smell is strong. The serum feels good in the face. I definitely recommend it! I received this product for free from Influenster’s.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Want beautiful glowing skin but this now. only used 2 days now. I feel like I'm glowing from the inside! Great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for 3 months now, specifically for my hyperpigmentation from post-acne marks. I was recommended by a Sephora employee since it’s 62x more potent than Vitamin C. I was a little bit skeptical at first if it would be able to reduce my spots and make my skin radiant. From my first week of using it twice a day religiously, I’ve noticed that all of my dark spots have faded and that my skin has gotten more dewier and radiant. I would highly recommend this for girls who have spots from picking at your acne and you want something that actually works. This product is worth every penny for $79 a bottle. Also you need a little bit of the product to make results appear which means that 1 bottle will last you for a very long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using it daily, I notice a difference within 2 weeks. Family and friends have mention how pretty my skin looks. I see one of my friends about 3 times a month and every time I see her she gives me complements!  I do see a big change in the dark spots I had on my checks and nose. Love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my absolute favorite serum! It does wonders for my combination skin, its packed with Vitamin C so I'm guessing that's why my skin glows and looks so radiant after using this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Caudalie and decided to spluge after using a sample of this. I am so glad I did because it is amazing! I started to notice a few small, light freckles show up on my cheek bones. I've been using this for a couple of months and those darker spots on my skin have brightened/gone away. I use this in the morning before SPF

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure if this product is for me. I'm down to the last drops of this bottle and I haven't seen a significant difference in my dark spots. My skin looks brighter when I use the Vinoperfect Concentrated Brightening Essence, but I'm not sure if it's a result of the products being paired or the essence by itself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is worth every cent. I have struggled with minor breakouts and an overall uneven skin. My skin would come close to being clear but then it would be really red or a pimple I had would take a while to completely go away (slightly scar). I got a sample of this with a purchase and within 1-2 weeks I noticed a much better complexion and that my skin really really cleared up. I haven’t had to use foundation in almost a month now bc this makes my skin very even and healthy looking. I use it every morning and night before moisturizing. Photo is after using moisturizer (Sephora brand instant moisture+cream hyaluronic acid booster)  with no make up on

reviews.review_title: Bye Bye dark spots, hello glowing skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this serum actually works! Clears up all my dark spots and yes I use a good sunscreen mixed in with my moisturizer! My face looks glowing and I see a huge difference! I have been using it the past year!!! Def a staple product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this worked great on my skin, really effective at bringing vitality to my complexion.. my skin cleared up and has stayed almost blemish free since using it. (I use it with the Vinoperfect Essence and love the visible results amd texture of my skin with it. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really amazing product that has helped me with my post acne struggles. I had a couple of months where my face was randomly full of pimples and once my dermatologist helped me get that in check, I was left with discoloration. I’ve had this serum for almost two months now and I’ve noticed a significant improvement! They aren’t totally gone but I’m at the point now where I can put a little concealer on and walk out to start the day, I don’t need a full face of makeup to hide them. I use it AM and PM and the bottle is a little more than halfway gone, so it doesn’t last as long as I’d like it to, especially for the price point;  but hey it works. I also started to use it in tandem with their brightening essence so fingers crossed these spots go away by the end of the year!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a small bottle of this when it was a 100-point reward. It feels great going on and smells wonderful, but it leaves the skin feeling sticky, which is not how I like to feel before bed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is the best from the brand and the best serum ever. It is light, dry very fast and It is help my skin looks natural glow, radiant. I've used La prairie Extrait of Skin Caviar before and tot that is the best but after I tried this Vinoperfect, I just switch it immediately and plus this Vinoperfect is much cheaper than Skin Caviar from La prairie. LOVE LOVE LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the glow if gives to my face, and I think it even helped the dark circles under my eyes a bit!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m going to go out on a limb and say that I love this serum.  It’s very light weight and milky.   I use one drop and it covers my entire face and neck.  The serum sinks right into my skin and is not sticky. I don’t detect any strong fragrance, so people with sensitive skin should be able to use the serum.  Now as far as brightening properties, I haven’t used the serum long enough to make that claim.  However, my skin overall, looks more even.  I still have minor dark spots that I can say are lightening up.  I do use this serum along with 2 additional serums (one of which is a vitamin C).  I also use the essence prior to this.  They work very well together.  Bottom line, I will be repurchasing the serum along with the companion essence.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product so much but I wished the price point was a little lower. I find myself using this and not needing lotion. Just mix a little with a sunscreen and I'm all set to go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was introduced to this product in 2016 and have been obsessed ever since. This is an amazing serum for everyday and wears beautifully under other skincare and makeup. I love this serum so much because it is so lightweight, absorbs quickly, and you can see radiance come from within almost immediately. I wear this product with my daily moisturizer and feel confident in my skin, no makeup required. I feel like you can see the visible benefits after about 6-8 weeks of using  the product, where your skin is bright, hydrated, and radiant before you put the serum on. I have gone through over 6 bottles of this stuff and it's the best. I feel like its better than any Vitamin C serum I have tried and leaves my skin feeling fresh. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. I’ve been using it for a few months and have noticed that my skin is smoother, brighter, and has a much more even tone. I’ve experienced less breakouts than ever and it’s lightened old and new acne scars. It’s safe for pregnancy, which is a current concern for me. I use it once a day before bed and it lasts a couple months. Definitely keeping this in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Did nothing. I used the whole bottle and for nothing for my acne scars and dark spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First received as a deluxe sample and liked it enough to purchase the full-size when the sample ran out. Very calming and helps to lighten red areas from past breakouts. Hydrating but not so much that it makes my moisturizer (La Mer Moisturizing Soft Cream) overkill. And it smells amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a game changer! The texture of my skin improves literally overnight after using this product. My only complaint is that it is so expensive. A little goes a long way, but it's still a lot. Definitely boosts the effectiveness of the other products in my regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice serum, but not life changing. I felt like it slightly improved the tone of my skin but it was nothing earth shattering or extremely noticeable. It did feel hydrating and didn’t irritate my skin or break it out. Unfortunately I needed it to help brighten and it didn’t deliver. I don’t think I would repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: BEST SERUM EVER!!!!! I had major hyper pigmentation on my chin, so many blotches and redness it was a mess! I purchased this because I was fed up nothing was working and I was like let’s give this a try before I stop using anything. I’ve been on it for only 2 weeks and a half and omg I see a world difference! Some of my spots completely faded , some are still there’s but significantly lighten up! Of course my skin still has spots ( because my skin was so bad) but I believe in a month from now my skin would be back to normal! I wake up and can’t believe what I’m seeing! Helped with my texture as well and didn’t break me out at all! Which usually vitamin c serums do, so I’m so excited! If you have problems with hyper-pigmentation and dark spots, get this and give it some time!! I know I left a review about Koress serum being the number one thing that changed my skin but after I used it for a longer time it broke me out like never before! And I rly wanted to delete my review but i didn’t know how! So now I could proudly say this has been the only product that has worked for me and is saving my skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. Got a sample size for my birthday last year and fell in love with this product.  Although it’s a bit pricey it’s worth the price. Leaves skin glowing and clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very skeptical about getting the serum because it is very expensive but decided to give it a shot anyways just because I wanted to get some of my acne scars to go away. I’m already halfway through the bottle and They are disappearing! I really want to re-purchase this but I’m gonna wait until I am almost done with the bottle! I also will say this though this did last me a very long time so that’s really good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried everything with my cystic acne and dark spots from acne scars.
