Anything that worked a little was either an antibiotic or super harsh and made my skin dry and uncomfortable. I have been using this for 3 weeks along with the Essence and have seen SUCH a difference in my dark spots. I have a larger cyst under my chin that has been there for almost 6 months and has looked like a bruise and it’s finally gone!   The rest of my cystic acne on my chin is clearing up and even my little pimples on my cheeks have gone away. I’m so happy This was recommended to me. I use Cereve foaming wash then use the garnier micellar water, the Caudalie essence and finish off with this serum. It has taken the place of my moisturizer and vitamin c serum. I will say it smells a little weird at first like white grape juice water lol but I got used to it and the results. Love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this product. I’ve seen awesome results since I started using this serum. My fave is brighter softer and the surface of my skin is smoother than ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product for 2 weeks now and I already can see the difference. My acne scars have faded a little. My skin is glowing and people have been noticing it too. I have combination skin and it works perfectly for me. It did not break me out and it made my skin care routine so much better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice serum, and the sample bottle has lasted for weeks!  My skin hasn’t been too dry/flaky and my complexion is a bit brighter.  However this hasn’t improved my skin texture nor has it protected me from breakouts.  This sinks right into my combination skin and smells nice, but I wouldn’t purchase the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a VIB gift with a $35 purchase, I have been using this for the last two weeks now and my pores have minimized and my skin is noticeably clearer and brighter. I am very pleased with this product so far and will consider purchasing the full sized product after my little sample jar runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: my skincare staple!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best products I’ve ever used. I don’t have many dark spots but my skin is very dull and blotchy. After using this for about a week, I have noticed a crazy difference. My face is super bright and even and EXACTLY what I have been trying to do for my skin. The serum is a little bit thick and leaves your face a little sticky but if you rub the product into your hands before applying it thins out. Would highly recommend this product to anyone struggling with brightening their skin!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this after a recommendation. I was looking for a serum that would help with acne marks for sensitive skin. I really wanted to like this because it’s clean. Unfortunately I broke out. I gave this a few tries but my break outs were consistent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Almost all serums I have tried bother my skin (sensitive, with rosacea). This, like many other Caudalie products actually seems to soothe my skin in addition to living up to its claims. Radiance? Absolutely. More even skin tone? Yes. I have freckles from sun damage and this seemed to lighten them. It gave me a rosy glow that I associate with a peel, perhaps some wouldn't like this, but I thought I looked healthier. A great product. Worth the money, though I didn't seem to be able to stretch it as long as others claim.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in Love my favorite serum

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample when I purchased other beauty items on Sephora. I've been using it often the past few weeks mainly at night, and some mornings. It feels silky when you apply it and smells soo good.. It has definitely helped with my skin evenness and calm it. My complexion has gotten better as well.. Good product but still not worth the price imo. Way crazy price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this w/ Olehenriksen's Sheer Transformation Perfecting Moisturizer. I love the smell and its texture (kind of like milk)! I used this for about 2 months and my dark spots and post pimple marks faded drastically. If I continue to use it, I am pretty sure they will be gone. It did not make me break out. A little goes a long way as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From all the raving about this product. I have been using it and consistently too,but I find it not working great at all for its money. My advise is a no go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so torn up about this product. It does what it claims and seems to have more brightening power than traditional Vitamin C alternatives. And I like using it because it clears up my dark acne scars better than anything else.BUT the fragrance in it makes me break out! So it's like fixing one problem while causing another...Claudalie will you consider making your products fragrance free?? Your product is only as good as its worst ingredient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly, I can’t say enough about this serum. I always get breakouts on my cheeks, I have large pores, and red patches on my face. After using this daily along with their Sorbet moisturizer, my skin is AMAZING! No zits, redness has been reduced by more than half, and my pores are starting to fade. One bottle lasts me 6 months. But it now!! You won’t regret it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, acne-prone skin that was beginning to show fine lines. I got a sample of this and figured I’d give it a try. It has dramatically changed my skin for the better. I don’t have little bumps on my cheeks and around my nose any more. My skin tone is more even and the weird dryness that I was starting to get has gone away. I’m on here to purchase a full size because nothing has worked on my skin like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My face feels so much more hydrated and smooth after using this in my night time routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample in the Luxe Play box.  I can’t quite describe it, but I have normally fair skin, freckled, perhaps a little Rosacea. I’ve used almost my entire sample after washing, before moisturizer (with spf 30 )and my skin tone appears more even than before, much less red, less appearance of freckles. I’m considering purchasing the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this stuff. I got the testers as a little gift for my birthday, and had never touched it. Not until I had an awful reaction to one of my foundations, that no cream or face wash was taking away. I tried for a WEEK to clear this reaction up. Then I remembered I had this just sitting in my room, and I gave it ago. I paired this with the sorbet, and it cleared my skin up within 2 HOURS!!! Went to bed, then woke up the next morning like, what reaction?? Its magic. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So lightweight and clean feeling. Has a super fresh light scent too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the smell of this serum! I’ve already ordered a larger bottle because I do not want to run out of it.  I’ve been using it twice daily for two weeks and my complexion does have s nice glow now.   It does not dry out my skin but it does absorb quickly to a dry finish. I have not tried caudalie moisturizers yet. I am currently using it with my Herbivore pink cloud rose water moisture Créme (which I love!).  They work well together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m amazed by how effective this is. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a combination skin. Medium/olive tone.  Had great expectations but didn’t see any results and it didn’t do anything for my dark spots which was the main reason I bought this expensive serum.  Don’t think I will buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This seems to be one of the best serums for sensitive skin that still DOES something - other sensitive serums I've tried didn't have much value for the money (I might as well have just bought Oil of Olay Regenerist). This one seems worth the price, and my sensitive skin hasn't reacted badly to it at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this serum makes my skin glowy and dewy. I use it under my foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really has done wonders for my very sensitive, acne prone skin with hyperpigmentation. It’s super gentle yet very effective, and I’m so grateful that I tried this!

reviews.review_title: great for perioral dermatitis / sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the only line I can use that doesn’t aggravate perioral dermatitis or eczema. This and the green bottles Caudalie, plus the Moisturizing Sorbet, are amazing for skin conditions like that. It isn’t too heavy, it’s free of all the “bad” stuff, it’s reasonably priced (a little pricey but so worth it and a little goes a long way). I really can’t say enough good things about it.   I have normal but sometimes sensitive skin (redhead, fair). Since I have gone back to using this as well as Lancôme Teinte Idole (also free of parabens etc) my skin flare ups have significantly decreased. AND this stuff gives you a refreshed look so that you can skip makeup.

reviews.review_title: I like it, just hoping it will fade my sun damage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used an entire bottle, and it made dark spots worse, I think because it is bringing them to the surface. I purchased another bottle and am hoping it will totally lift them out. It does make the skin soft, and moist.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this serum but I don't love it. It has been good for my skin but not amazing. I don't really see any brightening effects, however, it is very moisturizing and feels amazing to apply when my skin is stressed out. I do really like this, but I don't think I can justify the price. I just haven't seen enough results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I started off using this simply because I had gotten a sample as my birthday gift last year and I didn't to waste such a nice product, and WOW was I amazed. I honestly didn't expect anything from it, but my red scars from acne started disappearing left and right. It really gave me the confidence to go into summer with minimal makeup on. It also is a nice touch that it hydrates :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I tried this product was as a 100 point reward and I honestly think I took for granted the benefits of it but once I ran out, I started to notice the fine lines on my forehead and dullness of my skin. Yes it is pricey but it’s worrh it to me. I use about 4 drops of this at night after I wash my face. The product smells like fresh leaves but it not bothersome (to me). One of the best qualities is that it absorbs very well and can be used under makeup. I can’t wait to try more of this brands products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product enough to get a refill!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing product and I saw it's effects from just the first application. Initially got the trial size as a birthday gift last year and then reordered a full size coz I loved it so much. A little serum goes a long way and definitely works.

reviews.review_title: Acne pigmentation is already going away!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far so good only had this for about a week but my acne pigmentation is fading already and it smells amazing not to strong but just enough to be relaxing. Hopefully this wont brake me out on the dreaded second week.

reviews.review_title: Must-have product in your skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of my favorite skincare products. This is the first serum I’ve ever used and I don’t plan on ever using another one. After a few days of using this my skin looked a lot more brighter, radiant and I had less dark spots. Even when you apply it right away your face will be glowing and brighter. 80 dollars is kind of a lot but it works extremely well and should last about 3 months if you use 5 drops in the morning and at night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this in the Vinoperfect Serum Set that was sold a few months earlier. I love this serum because it smells great and does an amazing job of healing my acne scars or just the occasional blemish. I decided to finally write a review because it helped heal my skin from some acne bumps and mosquito bites that scabbed over. I try to use it sparingly because it's quite pricey, but would say that it's worth the money for what it does.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t notice a difference. I did peels, exfoliations and used this serum and also followed up with another Caudalie serum once I finished this. I have pasty and sallow skin with under eye circles and it didn’t do anything. I had also hydrated a lot, ate and drank juice, tea and foods rich in nutrients that promote radiant skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this serum for 7 months now and my skin looks better than when I was 21 and I'm now 32. This moisturizes and evens my very fair skin tone and I have not seen a single pimple in months. I have both dry and oily skin and this product helps both. Highly highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a ample and plan to purchase the full size. I moved from a very humid climate to a very arid climate and no amount of water consumption has fixed the dry skin patches around my nose and lips the way this little guy does. And a little surely goes a long way! I dab some on after patting my face dry, then apply my moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this for over a year now, every night before my moisturizer. This is the only serum I will use on my sensitive, dry  skin. Doesn’t break me out. Is not sticky. Helps with fine lines

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite serum that I have used so far, it really does make your skin radiant and bright!  I also feel moisturized for hours after putting it on.  I've been lucky enough to receive two good size samples through subscriptions, but I will be getting the full size when those run  out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a point bonus and I am not impressed. It feels so tight and gross on my skin. I’ll try to use it with other products but so far, I hate the way it feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love! My face looks so healthy and radiant! Will def be buying again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best serum. Definitely worth of your money. My skin has been super smooth and made my skin glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is wonderful. I decided to buy this after a recommendation by a Sephora rep/I purchased the gift set with the overnight cream as well. I don't think I'll be re-purchasing (since Truth serum does pretty much the same job and its more affordable), I do recommend it for those that would like to bring out a more dewy and smooth complexion. Give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I have tried just about every product out there for fading acne scars and dark spots and I am so happy to say THIS is the product! I saw visible results within just 2-3 days and I could not believe it... The scent is pleasant, the milky consistency is not heavy at all, and it sits very well on my face. I also usually break out from a lot of new skincare products and I was so surprised to see ZERO pimples or breakouts thus far. Although it is on the pricey side, I'd gladly pay the price for this again when my bottle runs out. All in all, one of the few products that claim to do what it does. Thank you, Caudalie!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had a lot of dark spots after my pregnancy, not quite a pregnancy mask, but more like Blotches. This helped tremendously after just a month of use. It’s pretty incredible. I use it in conjunction with a 2x weekly peel and I look 5 years younger: less dark spots, less fine lines, more glow. It expensive, but for those pushing 40 and above, it could be worth it, especially if you want something that’s cruelty free yet potent. So impressed, and I’m rarely impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOOVVEEEE this product!!!! It is so perfect for my combination skin. It perfectly fixes my redness and makes it look so healthy. I will gladly be buying!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I paired this product with the Caudalie Vinoperfect Glycolic Brightening Essence and saw considerable results! The formula is lightweight and absorbed quickly into my skin. I noticed that old acne scars began to fade and my skin complexion evened out and brightened. This product is a bit pricey but it's definitely worth the money. Will definitely buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: While this product is really expensive, I have noticed a huge improvement in brightening my under eye area. I can’t speak to correcting dark spots because I don’t have that issue, but it absolutely brightens skin and gives you that fresh faced look without needing concealer or highlighter. I’m a huge fan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Flaky red skin after use for a week. No thank you Vinoperfect line. Going back to the cheaper and more effective Vinosource.  Don’t buy this if you have sensitive skin. It’ll be a few weeks of grape water and sorbet to clear the effects.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just feels clean and like you are in a dermatologist office. I like how my face looks clean and healthy the next day. I have a very sensitive skin and this one only makes my skin so happy and not itchy like other products make it. Vinoperfect is really perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have acne and this stuff doesn’t irritate it and gives my skin a good amount of moisture. It’s helped my hyper pigmentation and even helped my current acne become less red

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feels light and goes great with the Vinosource Moisturizing Sorbet

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this product nightly for about 9 months, the glow is real! I can't believe how radiant my complexion looks. For the first time in a long time, I feel confident going bare faced. I use with the moisturizing sorbet every night and wake up to soft, glowing skin. Will recommend again and again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just got a point perk sample of this yesterday and used it last night and oh wow! This stuff has already shown a difference in my skin this morning. And I know it was this cause it was the only thing I added to my very usual skin care routine. Now I use DE C-Firma and their Protini, and a great toner in the morning and a K beauty Hyaluronic acid twice a day and a few other high end goodies one a very regular basis. So my skin has been pretty good for a while but I still felt like my skin needed a little oomph and this is the oomph. Hopefully this little vial will last me a while but it’s surely worth the purchase. Cannot wait to see how great my skin looks after a few weeks of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels lovely and has visible beautifying effect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Makes my skin feel AMAZING. Love it because I can use under SPF (which I wear every day), night cream, and foundation. Have pretty sensitive skin and this hasn’t irritated my skin at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Leaves my skin hydrated without feeling oily and it calms my skin (which is sometimes affected by hormonal break outs). My skin looks and feels better under my makeup too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nicely perfumed and you don't need much! So you can use this serum very long, even though I apply it everyday twice! You need to hydrate afterwards.  Spots

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not someone who is very much into skincare products as I did not really think a costlier serum would improve my skin. However, I must say this serum is great in combination with the brightening essence! I have been trying out this product for almost 3 weeks now? I use it daily in the morning and the night. I first use the brightening essence and then pat on this serum right after followed by my usual moisturizer. For me, personally, the finish of the cream is a little sticky and takes awhile to settle. For make-up users, i think the tackiness is great to set with powder? I am trying to wean off using make up and so I do not use any foundation or powder before i leave the house - so the stickiness gets to me a little in the day.   That said, apart from the texture, just within these 3 weeks, I have noticed improvement in my skin texture and also a visible reduction of my acne scars!!! (

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in my free birthday gift, and started using it regularly a few weeks before my wedding. It made my skin tone so even and I had very little discoloration under my eyes or around my mouth. And it just made me look more radiant over all! I'm still debating whether I can justify $79 for the full size though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium brown skin with some acne spots. I used this product religiously for 3 months and saw zero difference in those spots, nor did it do anything in making my skin radiant. The one star is for how this product smells...which was ok. Thoroughly dissatisfied. Don't waste your money on this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This helped a lot with my skin texture when I got it for my birthday present from sephora last year. I had a reaction to having metal frames on and nothing would help but this and when I forgot to use it for a few days I definitely saw a difference. The only thing is I wish it wasn't so expensive that I had to save up for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift from my sister and when I got it I was a bit confused. She's much younger than me and I still have pretty youthful skin.  I have oily skin and very acne prone but when I got this, man o man.  Its the reason my forehead ance is all cleared up, even the little bumps!  My skin looks dewy and never dryI have repurchased this and would recommend. Worth the hefty price tag

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have years trying so many products and spent so much money to clear my brown spots on my face. I do not recall how I rcvd this serum but I'm amazed how my face looks. I'm 62 and  many get blown away with my age thinking I'm 35 to 40 years old. This product is a 5 STAR on my list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have only been using this 2 weeks. I am very fair and have redness issues also a few hyperpigmentation spots from tanning in my 20s. This has diminished my redness almost completely. So amazed! Nothing seemed to help with redness. I have been using with the pink moisturizer with the vinosource name. Will continue to purchase both even though they r pricey. It's worth it, hardly have to use foundation anymore.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went into my local Sephora and was trying to update my skin regimen and stumbled across this gem! I used it a few times (sample) and fell in love with it. It is a bit on the pricey side but well worth the money. If you have darker skin like me this works wonders with dark makes!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum has never broken my oily skin out nor has it irritated it. This product has a pleasant, barely-there scent. It absorbs and distributes perfectly. Worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I definitely gave this product a chance.  I used an entire bottle in addition to the concentrated brightening essence and renewal night cream.  I have sensitive, fair skin with obvious large sunspots that this stuff didn't begin to touch.   Also I had major pore clogging issues as i have combination skin and i had several bouts of breakouts while using this stuff.  I really wanted it to work and i had high hopes based on the other reviews but alas.. nothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i immediately noticed a difference. my skin was brighter and more radiant. a little pricey, but i love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this serum for six months now, and after almost nightly use there's still a quarter of it left. I first got this serum in the birthday kit from 2017 and I didn't notice an immediate improvement the next morning, but after it ran out, I realized that this was what had been giving my skin that special glow. After a few weeks of using this serum, my dark spots and acne scars had faded, I looked younger, and my skin was radiant. I'm glad I bought the full size, this serum was definitely worth the investment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ended up with a sample sized bottle and let it sit around for a long time.  Got curious and used it, which surprised me pleasantly.  My face just feels extra happy with this lightweight, almost milky, and silky serum.  I've almost run out of my sample, but feel that it is worth the investment, so I'm buying the big-girl size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic serum!! Leaves skin smooth and bright.  Apply before your moisturizer or in place of one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this product is amazing. i have oily skin that peels a lot and this product didnt clog my pores and reduced the peeling and scabbing of my acne. i have gotten countless compliments since using this product. i got this as a gift so i didnt realize the price for a while but i would confidently buy this with no regrets.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing got tons of compliments after a week on my skin. Definitely evens skin tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a gift for my birthday and I have been determined to buy it next chance I get. Very gentle, moisturizing, smells great, I feel literally radiant! Instant love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got to use the trial size version of this product as an insider Birthday gift. I honestly didn’t think it would do anything BUT I noticed when I use it daily my face was brighter. I didn’t look tired and my skin didn’t look so dehydrated and dull without makeup. A little really goes a long way and I am trying to remember that now that I’ve purchased the full-size product. Must use daily to continue to see results because I can definitely tell when I don’t use it. I think this is a perfect intro into serums and stepping up your skin care. Worked wonders for my dark circles !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Me...Asian-skin on the olive side, hyper pigmentation and sun spots approaching age 50. Started using this serum in the sample size. Recently ordered the regular size after seeing a noticeable benefit. Spots are lighter, skin actually looks firmer and smoother. Important to note that I double cleanse, use an essence before the serum, and a pm moisturizer once serum has absorbed. I think the benefit is a result of the entire nightly regimen which allows this serum to do its job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The best radiance serum I’ve ever tried. I’ve received so many compliments on my skin. Two of my friends have bought this product because they love my skin so much ❤️

reviews.review_title: Try to buy it in a set
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After finishing Caudalie’s Thirst Quenching serum, the skincare specialist at my Sephora recommended I try this serum for my acne scars and complexion. The serum is absolutely amazing; it has made my skin brighter, softer, and healthier. I purchased this serum in a set that came with a small size of both the brightening essence and the overnight renewal cream, which costed a total of $79. I don’t think I would repurchase the serum alone for $79 dollars, although I do think it has been very effective. In another set, I would repurchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I see results after a week!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a mini sample set during my birthday month. Used day and night. I didn't notice any improvements to my skin but it didn't make my skin worse. I enjoyed as a sample but at that price you can get something that works better and costs less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just ok. I don’t see any change for dark spots. I have been using for several months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: ive used quite a few luxury skin care items and don't care to spend money on products I feel are worth it. this isn't one of them. I replaced a product I used for skin radiance with this one and after a month of consistent use, I noticed no difference. in fact my skin was losing the radiance I had worked so hard to get and I discontinued use of this and went back to my trusty product to bring my skin back to it's optimal health. I had read so many great reviews that I was so disappointed in this. I didn't have unrealistic expectations but even realistic expectations weren't met. I have normal to combination skin wothout noticable wrinkles and slight uneven skin tone with some dullness if not treated so maybe my skin wasn't severe enough but if yours is like mine then save the money. there are better products for cheaper than this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this serum but it made me break out with small little bumps on my face. I have oily skin and am already acne prone, so it's a disappointment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Caudlie products however I feel like this serum did not really live up to its name. It moisturized my skin very well however it didn’t brighten my dark spots or show any visible improvements to my skin. I was disappointed because I love Caudlie and this was pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. It honestly makes my skin so soft and hides so many of many problem spots. You don’t need to use much either. My only issue is that it’s a little tacky even after you let it dry for a minute or two.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If I could only use one product on my skin, this would be it. I’ve been using this serum for several years, and it’s the first time in my adult life that I feel comfortable wearing little to no makeup in public. It doesn’t break out my acne prone skin, and has done wonders for fading my dark spots and old acne scars.   I will say, if you are looking for something with overnight results, this is NOT the product for you. Slow and steady wins the race with this one. You will definitely see results, but it may not be as quick as some harsher treatments may claim to work.

reviews.review_title: Didn't work for my dark spots.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Used this serum twice daily for 2 months, so no difference with acne marks on my face. It did hydrate and temporarily brighten my skin, however it is not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome serum! Works like a charm!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin. The serum is light and not feel sticky after applying it. The smell is amazingly good! I was using other serums but I don’t use them everyday since I don’t like my face to have like a lot of stuff applied and made my hair and pillow sticky. I will recommend this if you feel the same way with me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this as it was recommended by a sephora employee but it ended up doing nothing for coloration and made my skin break out all over!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product (especially the smell). I've used this for a few months now and I do think my skin looks more even-toned and glowy. I would definitely recomend it and I might repurchase it, however I'm not obsessed enough to definitely buy again. Very glad I tried it but I think I was hoping for more dramatic results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as a sample. I applied it with a new night Cream I’ve purchase around the same time. I was using both for the first time. I woke up the next morning and OH MY GOD. The difference was just WOW!! My face looks fresh, youthful and BRIGHT! I didn’t know whether it was the cream or serum. I swore them separately each night and it became apparent to me that the serum was the one. Went back to return the cream and got the serum.. of course! Now it’s the 15% sale and I’m buying the whole set :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it, but I go through it so quickly and it's so expensive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this serum along with the sorbet in 2017 as birth gift. I started using it when I moved from a rainy and mild climate to a cold and dry one. It leaves my skin soft and hydrated, helps managing flaky dry skin, and I do notice that my skin has this radiance. I'm on my second bottle now, continuing using with the sorbet.

reviews.review_title: Saw a glow on day one.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I saw a glow on my face the first day I wore this I have oily skin and slight discoloration. I also use DE and SR skincare products it works well with other products.  This is the serum not a moisturizer so make sure to put a moisturizer on top of it especially if you have dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample as a birthday gift from Sephora. Every time I use it I wake up with great skin, it gets so smooth and I love it because my skin is dry. I’ll probably buy the regular size when my sample is done.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a ok product. I would say it does help me a little bit with the acne scars (only the new scars), my skin is more even skin tone and dewy (about 40%), but the thing is it's super pricey and the result comes kinda slow. I would try to find something else that work faster. Will come back until I try all of my serum list.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not sure if my formula was bad but it literately smells like paint primer which isn’t a great smell no matter the time of day. I have very sensitive skin so I usually try to give new products some time to adjust but this broke me out in areas I’ve never had acne before. I then tried using as a spot treatment on just the current acne and it did nothing for the pigmentation. Not sure if mine was just a dud but I was very excited to try this and disappointed I didn’t love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good light moisturizer but I didn’t see much of a difference with fine lines. I purchased a serum from juice beauty which I saw better results with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After about 2 months and most of the bottle, I haven’t noticed any change to my dark acne marks.  It does give your skin an instant brightening effect though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I went through the whole bottle and I saw no difference in my skin and complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Caudalie products and was excited to try this serum. The packaging is so chic and easy to use. The serum is easy to apply and dries immediately. Unfortunately, the positives stop here.  After using this serum for 1 day, my face turned into a scaly dry mess. I looked like a snake shedding skin. So gross. It was on my cheek, nose,  chin, and forehead. I was hoping the serum wasn't the culprit but it was the only thing I changed in my routine. I decided to give it another try this week. Again, awful scaly skin. It is patchy, dry, and borderline scabbing in some areas.   Definitely try on small area before use. My skin is not very sensitive but it definitely was not about this serum. I look like a dry serpent monster thanks to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was meh. I was super underwhelmed. I am dark skin AA woman and I felt that all it did was brighten my face by three or four shades. My dark spots are still here.  It's a waste of money if you have SERIOUS hyperpigmentation. If you're just looking for overall complexion change, then this may be the product for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum was a miracle for my skin. I never took care of my skin in my teen years or even in my early 20s. I had uneven skin tone and acne spots that left me feeling awful about my skin. I started seeing results within two months and it kept progressing. Three years later, I still use this serum and it’s the only one that I have used. After consistent use, my skin has seen dramatic differences. Complexion is brighter, even skin tone, and the acne spots are gone. People have asked me what foundation I use and you know what I tell them? I’m not wearing foundation. It’s that amazing. Highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is truly AMAZING!!! At first I was iffy because of the price but it’s def worth the money. I had a lot of dark blemishes because of acne underneath my neck area due to hormones. After using this for almost 2 months my scars are nearly gone. This is hands down the best I’ve used the serums from keihls, clarins even have have gotten acne facials. Nothing had worked until this serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! At first it does seem a little sticky, but as it dries, it feels soooo nice on the skin! I love this product because the serum is very cooling and hydrating and it helps so much for my dry skin. It feels very luxurious and makes me feel fancy and pampered! A must have for my everyday routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve noticed zero difference in my skin and I don’t get the point of this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve finally just used the birthday gift sample of this and I’m a week, I saw results. Everyone has been commenting how good my skin looks. I’ve had some bad acne scars from months ago that starting to disappear. I wished I took a before picture, but to see how my skin now after and how real results, it’s breathtaking. I will be buying a full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of this in my ipsy bag. I am not the person to take time and leave a review but this product was amazing. I had lots old stubborn acne scars and this faded them all! My skin has never been this even!

reviews.review_title: It's annoying how much I love this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I apply this serum before I go to bed and the next day I always feel it's a waste to even wear makeup. This stuff makes your skin look amazing that instantly. I wouldn't say that overtime much changes after the first use from what I've seen though. The price is kind of steep, which is my only drawback. The bottom line is that this is a (wonderful) brightening serum, not really a skin clearing serum (I've seen no dark spot correction), so keep that in mind when you're thinking about purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this serum.  I first tried it when I got it as a part of birthday gift from Sephora. I had never used face serums before and this worked so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a sample size for a birthday treat. I started using it after seeing that meme with the old black shoes that says if you had these you should be using a serum. Holy moly, I didn't know what I was missing! After using this day and night for about 4 or 5 days, I could tell a difference. My pores drank this up every day. My skin looked brighter, my pores looked smaller, and overall the tone of my face improved. The full size is a bigger chunk of money--but I'm going to get the value pack with 3 items (same size serum as this one) to try the products that complement this one. Overall, I was super surprised that I could tell a difference. What a wake up call.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this for about a week now and it has taken away my redness and i can already see some sun spots fading away and some old acne scars. Its so light and smells lovely. I use the essence then this serum then the overnight cream. Im obsessed with this line!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cruelty free, and only a tiny bit is needed. My first experience with a serum, so I’m not sure that I’m using it correctly ( I put face cream on after I use it?)  but it seems to do a nice job. It’s a little bit sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought a bottle for my mom. The bottle is so big, I had to take transfer some of the serum in the sample bottle for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample and have been using it for 4 months now. When the sample ran out my husband said you need to go get the full size. Even after telling him the price tag we went to Sephora the next day. I have very very sensitive skin and get a lupus rash that this seems to sooth the inflammation and redness. Hubby says it gives me an effortless glow. Light weight non greasy but still has moisturizer feeling

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing.  I received this as a free sample and I made it last til he last drop.  It smoothed my skin and was perfect for my uneven skin tone and sensitivity.  It just costs way too much for me to pay!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so excited that I decided to chance it and purchase this product. I’m 25 and the need for a serum isn’t the first thing on my mind. However, my breakouts were leaving me with a lot of red marks and dark spots that would sometimes take months to fade. This serum has drastically reduced the amount of time that the spots stay on my face, and most of them actually disappear within 2 or 3 days. My skin is EXTREMELY sensitive, but I’m pleasantly surprised that this product hasn’t made me break out or have any kind of irritation. I’d like to buy all of the products from this line and see how well they all work together. Nonetheless, I’d recommend this serum to anyone and everyone I know struggling with acne hypermigmentation and dull skin. The price seems steep, but I don’t see myself using it up before 6 months or even longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great product it makes your skin feels very good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have struggled with cystic acne and horrible scarring for years along both of my cheeks. I have really sensitive skin, so trying new products is hard for me because I often break out or react poorly to new products. After lots of research and looking at reviews, I decided to give this product a chance.   I use about four drops, day and night, following toner and I follow up with a moisturizer afterwards. After a few uses, my skin started to feel healthier, softer, and hydrated. It wasn’t until a month or so in that I started to notice my dark spots lightening up and healing. It helps keep my skin hydrated throughout the day. It’s been a few years now and I have lost count of how many bottles I’ve gone through. It’s one of my holy grails and when I don’t use it, I visibly see a difference in my skin (more dull, doesn’t heal well, no glow). My skin has become more radiant, healthy, and many of my scars have lightened up/disappeared.  This is not a stand alone product. It’s something to add to a skincare routine. It doesn’t solve for breakouts, but heals them better and maintains balance in your skin. I love this and would recommend to anyone looking for something to soothe, hydrate, and brighten.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fine serum. I use it in the morning and it is very moisturizing. I really like the texture. However, it has not done anything except moisturize. It hasn't brightened or tightened my skin like I expect most serums to do. Its a good addition to a routine you already have, but I would not rely on this as your only serum.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t see a big enough difference in tone, brightness, or reduction of hyperpigmentation to warrant purchasing this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite serum by far. It makes my skin feel smooth and lightens discolorations, including acne scars. It is mild enough that I use it on areas where my eczema flares, and it does not burn or cause irritation or dryness. I love this serum!

reviews.review_title: Great product, not sure if it’s worth the $
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how quickly this absorbs into my skin.  My skin is glowing, though for the price tag  I wish it did more for my complexion and acne.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum, it's amazing.  The one thing I'm not a huge fan of is the price (it's 39,20 euros in France, which is around 50 USD) but other than that, the serum is magical.  I really love the product a lot, I just with that in the States it was more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finished 2 bottles of this & wish I didn't waste $160. It did nothing for me...except break me out like crazy!!! my face has never been worse to be honest with you. last year I got the sample birthday thing & I thought this stuff was amazing. I think the scent is lovely & it gave me such a radiant glow. bought a bottle & thought it was ok but didn't do anything besides glow (anything can make you glow lol) but I thought well maybe it's just me & the pimples are unrelated. It was sold out, bought another bottle because I thought I must be crazy, this stuff really was awesome...nope. you live & you learn.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product got it as a birthday gift and decided to try the whole thing definitely no regrets , really good product!

reviews.review_title: My skin has never felt smoother!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this some time ago and used it for awhile, then got lazy and stopped. Recently, in an effort to clear out half-used products in my bathroom, I started using it regularly again and after 2-3 days of using it 2x a day, I noticed a very significant difference in the texture of my skin. It was so smooth and soft, some of the bumps and roughness that had been there had smoothed out, and my face just looked and felt brighter and younger. Using a serum can feel like an unnecessary step, like you're just putting a lot of junk on your face, but this one is worth the extra step, worth the extra few bucks. Give it a minute or two to absorb before putting on your moisturizer and it won't feel so sticky. My 36-yr-old mildly sensitive combination skin loves this stuff, and I will definitely keep using it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum. It is my first time using a serum and I have noticed within a week that my dark spots are fading and that it leaves my skin feeling fresh.

reviews.review_title: Really works to fade dark spots!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this serum!  Very lightweight, absorbs quickly, not at all greasy.  Causes no irritation or breakouts on my sensitive, rosacea-prone skin; and has done more to fade my sun/age spots and acne scars than any other product I've tried.  Even after just a week of twice daily use, my fair skin is more even-toned, brighter, soft, smooth, and hydrated.  Pricey, but totally worth it imo.

reviews.review_title: horrible - face covered in tiny zits!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Don't normally leave reviews. Broke out into tiny, hive-like zits all over my face and neck (where I applied it). Yes, I am sure it was this serum - after the first time I experienced the breakout (was using a new Caudalie moisturizer from the same reward/sample), I took a months-long break from it...then kept my entire routine the same except for adding this serum. Same breakout!! I don't consider my skin to be sensitive, so everyone please be wary of this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has really transformed my skin! I have never used anything that has produced such results. My skin is visibly smoother, and more even and I am truly glowing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry/combination skin, and didn't realize that a lot of my breakouts were the product of overdrying my already dry skin. I've been using the vinoperfect moisturizer for a few years, but only recently tried this serum a month ago - what a difference using these two products together! My skin is clear and well hydrated. Definitely a lifesaver product that I have adopted into my normal skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought a bottle of this while in Paris and ever since I haven’t looked back. The short period of time between buying bottles I definitely saw a difference. This serum really does help even out my skin tone and get rid of the discoloration from break out and makes my face just look so much more vibrant. Caudalie knows what they are doing when it comes to skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! This is my go to serum, but I run out of the product fast and it could be pricey to keep going to get it ever 3-5 months. But it’s the best serum for acne prone skin, well worth the money. I also have sensitive skin and tbh it was recommended to me by one of the Sephora workers and I haven’t stopped using it since I was introduced to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. It smells lovely but is gentle on my skin. I try to use it once a day as this is a splurge for me, but I can see the difference if I skip a day. Goes on well under my moisturizer and brightens, leaving me with a glow without looking oily. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this serum. I had gotten samples from Sephora before, but could not bite the bullet with the price. So when I got a gift card, this is what I purchased, and I’m so happy I did! I have gotten SO many compliments on my skin just looking glowing and very healthy. I don’t necessarily have any dark spots for it to combat, but it’s certainly evened out the texture in my skin. I use this with the Caudalie Vinosource Sorbet afterward and it’s a winning combo. I’m rarely faithful to a skincare brand, but Caudalie has me for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Mediocre product. Was using a sample for almost 2 months. Honestly didn't do anything earth shattering to my skin. Especially for $80. I gave stars cause it smells amazing and feels nice on the skin. Did it make my skin radiant? Ha, not really. Really nothing noteable from this product....very average.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. It is so light weight and not sticky or greasy at all. You need very little product so it lasts for a long time. I had for this as my Beauty Insider birthday pack and I have been using this regularly for 3 months. I just purchased the full size bottle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product but I've been using it Daily for over 3 months now and not satisfied with the results. I also bought the brightening toner same brand and no results. I was disappointed since I spent a lot of money of these products.

reviews.review_title: You need this. Can’t live without.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought the Christmas edition Brightening kit with this serum, the vino essence and night cream and I’m obsessed with all three. Already repurchased this after a few months of day/night use. Makes acne scars lighten quicker and brightens the skin to a more youthful appearance. Also hydrates my skin enough to where I don’t get as many blemishes as I used to, I think my skin just needed TLC and this was it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. It brightens my skin and makes it glow.  It also makes my skin hydrated and soft. It smells heavenly. I love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a holy grail amazing product!! I typically have oily to combo, acne-prone skin. I never see results with new products for about 3 weeks, but with this I noticed a smoother complexion after TWO DAYS! I am now on accutane and this product is still gentle enough for my to use without irritation! My dark marks have faded like crazy and my skin is glowing. I’ve heard this even works on stretch marks and I can’t wait to try! Would recommend this to everyone of all skin types :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t often 5-Star items but this serum has been great on my combination- sensitive skin. I’ve used it regularly for about a month and I’ve had far fewer breakouts, my skin looks and feels smoother .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum. It has even the discoloration around my eyes and forehead area. It gives a great glow for my skin. I use it twice a day, and every time my face feels soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE!!! Received first as a sample and loved it so much I had to buy it. Makes my skin feel hydrated without a greasy film!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have not had any change in skin tone or any improvement or even fading of dark spots or color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum! Gives me a radiant glow in the morning. I love how it feels on my face. Havent seen a significant difference in my dark spots, but I will continue to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a huge dry spot and right away used this and it helped it all. This helped my acne as well somehow and I just found it amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been giving this serum a fair chance for half a year! I think that is enough time to be able to be fair with my review. ON ME It did not do much but cause me to break out with tiny little pimples. I would stop using it and my skin would go back to normal, and then 2-3 days after using this daily I would break out again. I’m one of the blessed ones that never breaks out so there’s something in it that my skin hates. So just keep that in mind. I then took off another star because even though I’ve been using it on and off, I haven’t really seen any difference in my skin. My other serums show a big difference in skin texture and over all health after about three days. This didn’t. ☹️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this serum, and I've been living off the samples since November (~3 months) and I would love to buy this, but I want to find a serum that is cheaper but has good results. It has evened out my skin, decreased the appearance of old scars from picking at acne (curse High school me), and my skin is glowing! It soaks in quickly, and a couple of drops is enough for your face and neck!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is expensive. I enjoy the feeling of it, but haven’t noticed a major improvement in my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Have not had any change in skin tone or any improvement or even fading of dark spots or color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this serum! Gives me a radiant glow in the morning. I love how it feels on my face. Havent seen a significant difference in my dark spots, but I will continue to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I had a huge dry spot and right away used this and it helped it all. This helped my acne as well somehow and I just found it amazing.
